story:
Long Story Short

Over the past couple years I have noticed numbness in my feet as well as excruciating pain shooting through them, this is caused by Diabetic Neuropathy, which means my veins have constricted making it difficult for oxygen and nutrients to reach my nerves, specifically in my feet, though it has effected other areas to a lesser extent.

Any of you that know me also know that I have never had much money, and have had medical bills stacking up the past 9 years with no sign of them going away. Add to it the fact that I have no insurance, have to buy my diabetes meds out of pocket, food, gas, and other amenities to maintain a typical life. I can't ask family for help because no one is in a position financially to contribute what I need due to the many hardships we have faced the past 6 years. This is my last resort, I don't expect anyone to throw huge amounts of money into this, I just pray that I can get some sort of help, any help at all.

What I Need

My goal is $2000, that number will at least take care of doctors appointments and meds until such a time that I need any procedure done. I'm not out to get everything taken care of by others, just a helping hand.

The Impact

Many of you know how much my family means to me, and I would love to see my nephews get the same from me that my niece has had the past 13 years. I want them to have the opportunity to have their uncle pick them up and wrestle with them, carry them around when they're tired, and sneak them a cookie from a cabinet they can't reach. I really just want them to share in the joy they give me everyday just by having them around.

Another reason I desperately need your help, I want to be a chef. I know of blind chefs, chefs missing hands or fingers, but I have never heard of a wheelchair bound chef. It can't be done, you have to be able to move in the kitchen and be able to reach things on the stove, grill, shelves, etc. I've been trying so hard to make my dream come true and this could be the death of it. If you'd like to see what I can do, make a donation, I will be glad to make you dinner and dessert as a thank you for what you have done for me

Other Ways You Can Help

Pass this page around to people that may be inclined to help, some moral support if you can't contribute, a kind word if I'm having a rough day, or if I'm fortunate enough to see you a smile or hug. I truly wish I had another way to thank you for anything that you may contribute aside from a heartfelt thank you, but sadly I don't have anything to give.

story:
The new technology behind the Neuro-Synergy System is designed to bring the core Body/Mind control centers in the nervous system into a state of complete synergy and balance....a state called HOMEOSTASIS. Homeo: within myself, STASIS: zero stress and balance. Homeostasis is a foundation state of the body that must be present before the body can really heal. At the Center for Neuroacoustic Research we work directly with the most prominent 21st century dis-ease, a dis-ease which is silently robbing the majority of society of good health and wellness and is the baseline cause of most diseases in the developed world. It is --

                                            The Loss of Homeostasis!

What's causing this loss of Homeostasis? STRESS! Our bodies were designed for a sprint not a marathon. Our present body was designed hundreds of thousands of years ago for a very different environment of stress then we now experience. What used to be waking with the sun, grabbing a spear and going out to chase breakfast (and that's your workday) has become a never-ending series of stress assaults on our body/mind....alarm clock / rushed breakfast / processed food / traffic jams / fumes / pollution / stressful job / never enough money / home after a long day / rushed microwaved dinner / evening news on TV (!!!) / kids,homework,etc / ever wonder why you can't sleep... and tomorrow is "Rinse and Repeat"!

The Neuro-Synergy System specializes in reducing stress to ZERO and re-training the stress handling centers of the body to return to normal function: HOMEOSTASIS.

The main control centers in the body use the state of Homeostasis to tell all the systems in the body what to do. This loss of the ability of the body to return to its core zero-stress state of Homeostasis, causes the main control centers in the nervous system to begin to lose control of the body. Our clinical research over the past 30 years has resulted in patented techniques for measuring Homeostasis in the nervous system and returning the system to a state of homeostasis-synergy using precisely tuned sound frequencies through the body as low frequency vibrations. The whole approach used in the Neuro-Synergy System is very complex, but the core approach is returning the master control systems of the body to the Homeostasis State of Neuro-Synergy. 

From Wikipedia:

Synergy is the interaction of multiple elements in a system to produce an effect different from or greater than the sum of their individual effects. The term synergy comes from the Greek word synergiaσυνέργια from synergos, συνεργός, meaning "working together".

WHAT IS BEHIND THE NEURO-SYNERGY SYSTEM?

Neuro-Synergy Systems (NSS) is dedicated to placing a clinically tested, high-tech holistic healing system into the main-stream healthcare market.The strength of NSS’s work lies in its foundation of over two decades of scientific clinical research with thousands of patients and volunteers using recognized medical monitoring systems that can show the benefits of this therapeutic approach in the brain, brainwaves and deep nervous system control centers of the body for a wide range of health conditions without the use of drugs or surgery. This testing and research has shown us which types of sounds, music, brainwave entrainment frequencies and primordial sounds work best generically for a new breed of "Prescription Only" healing soundtracks beneficial for the largest audience possible.

THE NEURO-SYNERGY SYSTEM IS PLACED - NOT SOLD

Yes, our business model for the Neuro-Synergy System is a new paradigm for many.  It is  unique, whereby we are Not selling the Systems, thereby assisting Venue owners to enhance their practice or business by asking for no capital outlay to pay for the System. We Place and then Maintain the Systems in doctor's offices, hospitals, spas; nursing and residential facilities; gyms, fitness centers and athletic facilities; human resource and nursing departments for employees and in corporate offices at No Cost. We charge a small fee, not a percent, whenever an individual uses the System, however.

We also electronically monitor the functionality of the System through the internet. If something appears to be a slowing down or not performing correctly we can fix it remotely if it is a software problem. If it is a hardware problem, our placement personnel come and switch out the faulty part or replace the whole system if necessary, at no cost to the Venue.

We want to empower as many practitioners and businesses as possible to enhance and complement their service to those who need to re-gain or "find" their Neuro-Synergy so they can better heal and enjoy good health.  We want to reward the Venues by boosting their income by upwards to $3,000 a month with no additional cost to them, simply by using the System. And we want all to help spread this new holistic healing modality throughout the world. Society needs help.  We need your help. Can you / will you "Pay the good received thus far in your life Forward"? We hope so!  Everyone can and will profit!

WHAT IS THE ULTIMATE GOAL HERE?

The goal of CNR is to bring to the scientific community and to the public-at-large, a well-researched, safe, non-invasive, intrinsically gentle but powerful modality for managing personal health and well-being, and for personal growth and transformation, safe for all ages. This is accomplished through Dr. Thompson’s clinically tested sound compositions  and it is with his scientifically engineered Neuro-Synergy Sound Chairs and Tables aka System that we move toward our vision -- a vision of individuals, and eventually the world, healthy and living its highest purpose – living, working and playing from its center.

Our Motto: 

“Healing Body * Heart * Mind and Spirit through the Scientific Application of Sound” .

           DR. JEFFREY THOMPSON

    Founder of Neuro-Synergy Systems

Dr. Thompson has been experimenting with sound scientifically since 1980. He first started in his Holistic Health Center in Virginia which grew to be the largest Center of its kind in Virginia at the time. His experiments were in using exact sound frequencies to make Chiropractic spinal and cranial adjustments, to stimulate and normalize organ function and to balance Acupuncture Meridians. He developed a very gentle and effective method of making adjustments and continues to use this approach today. His gentle and effective method is much appreciated by his patients. 

In addition to his chiropractic expertise, Dr. Thompson is recognized as a worldwide expert in the field of acoustic pacing frequencies incorporated into musical sound tracks. A consummate musician and composer in his own rite, he has established a method for using modulated sound-pulses for changing states of consciousness for optimal "Mind-Body" healing. 

Dr. Thompson's first recording, Isle of Skye, was carried by major music distributors in the US within its first month of release. Within the first six months, it was adopted by the American Hypnotherapy Association for its use in hypnosis. His CDs are carried nationally in major stores and catalogs: Barnes & Noble, Borders, Sam Goody's, Waldenbooks, Nightingale-Conant, Nautilus, and many others. His work with Brookstone, Inc. and other companies are carried in their respective stores and websites.

The accomplishments and creativity of Dr. Thompson is nothing short of being “mind-boggling”. He continues to be very prolific in his efforts and dedication to the healing of the Global Body of the Universe through the healing of individuals of which it is comprised.

Scott Gressitt has over 42 years of designing and building furniture, space planing interiors for both work and play. He is a very multi-talented musician, artist, sprocket scientist, software developer, 3D data acquisitor (involving laser and structured light scanning), photogrammetrist, writer, actor, pro hang glider pilot, and all around your everyday scallywag.

With such an eclectic resume, Scott is confident there isn't any goal he can't accomplish once he sets his mind and heart on a project.              RICHARD MCGRANAHAN

        Electronics | Software Design

We're lucky to have someone with lifetime experience like Richard McGranahan on our team. Richard started off in the computer industry in 1969 where he left Kansas to go to New York where he automated the New York Stock Exchange. Whilst there, he provided technical support for a number of IBM mainframes. From there, his endeavors took him to Cleveland, Ohio where he automated their Police Department as well as the Water Department's booking systems. In 1970 he moved to Oskosh, Wisconsin to work at Kimberly-Clark, a paper company for whom he developed a management system for their forestries so that they could accurately measure the growth rate of trees and determine what their yields were going to be. After his time there, Richard ended up in Florida where he worked for TRW's electronics firms and automated their banking networks. In 1978, he became the Director of Communications for American Express working for them for two years. 

It wasn't until 1979 that McGranahan found himself in sunny California, and decided to stay. His initial position was with a company called CubicWestern where he automated ski resorts' (across America) ticketing machines. Then he developed software for managing credit card processing and communications for the airline industry. He became a private consultant to the airline industry in 1980 where he helped a significant number or airlines (such as United, Delta, etc.) automate their back rooms and data centers. In 1983 he automated credit card processing for the hospitality across Mexico. He developed wireless boards until he retired in 1994, and now finds himself still eager to develop cutting edge technology for the right minded people. Ever since Richard discovered vibrational medicine, he has become a core member of this team.

Brainwave Entrainment and Hemisphere Synchronicity

This phenomenon of hemisphere synchronicity is due to a quirk in how the brain processes information and the physics phenomenon of the Critical bandwidth. When two tones are tuned within 18% of one another (or within the critical bandwidth) the brain cannot distinguish two separate tones, it hear one single tone with a pulse within it. The speed of the pulse it hears is the difference between the two tones. Through headphones, however, the opposite hemispheres, which process sound information from each opposite ear, have to compare information in order to hear the pulse. Actually the brain is manufacturing the pulse out of thin air, moment by moment. When the hemispheres compare information, they synchronize their activity: thus hemisphere synchronicity. 

We know from other research efforts that brainwave synchronicity does not happen often and when it does, it is only for an instant. We know it is associated with the "aha" moment, the moment when the answer to a problem pops into mind, in times of great inspiration, and certain high states of revelry and meditation. With this new technological method of entraining brainwaves with binaural beats using headphones, however, it is possible to float the brain in this hemisphere synchronicity state for prolonged periods of time. Each time we do this, it is like exercising a new brain function - which makes the brain more able to engage this function as its normal repertoire of behavior. It is like going to a gym on the inside and working the "muscle" of your brain. 

Using sound in these ways, it is possible to make profound changes in brainwave patterns and states of consciousness, observable on brainwave mapping equipment (EEG), as well as positive changes in the body, measurable with blood tests, bio-feedback equipment and other sophisticated procedures. We are also able to influence the core balance and functioning of the brain and central nervous system as a whole. 

In a series of recordings based on these principles I have used sound frequency patterns built into the music that have been shown clinically to cause positive changes in consciousness, brainwave and body function.

A good part of the stress we all experience in the twentieth century is due to the advancements of our own technology. This same technology, combined with our traditional techniques for healing and achieving balance, may help neutralize the stress we have created. 

Primordial Sounds
Many of the sounds you hear on these recordings are sounds you do not even notice. Certain sounds have the power to awaken deep levels of recognition in the subconscious mind. I call these sounds "Primordial Sounds," sound primordially recognizable to the subconscious mind regardless of race, sex or language. 

Our first sensory experience in life as a fetus in the womb is of sound and vibration. The symphony of sound patterns we experience at this time will be deeply imbedded in our subconscious mind for the rest of our lives - water swishing sounds, arterial pulse sounds and voice sounds. These are our first experiences of "Primordial Sounds." 

Recordings of these types of sounds form some of the "primordial sounds" you hear on this recording. By changing the speed of these sounds we can side step the rational/thinking mind, which will no longer recognize the sounds, and tap into the subconscious directly, with sounds it deeply recognize and respond to.

Sounds from Space 
In 1989 we were approached by an aerospace engineer with sound recordings from the Voyager spacecraft. These recordings were taken as Voyager passed by the outer planets of our Solar System - Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune.

These were recordings of charged electromagnetic particles (ions) in the magnetic fields of these planets vibrating within the range of human hearing. What did they sound like? They sound like dolphins, choirs of voices singing, crickets, birds, Tibetan bowls, and ocean sounds, plus other sounds too strange to identify, but which seem very familiar.

It is these three classes of sound ("Primordial Sounds", "Brainwave Entrainment" and "multi-layered 3-D music") that are embedded in all Dr. Thompson's soundtracks and recordings to awaken the various levels of the subconscious mind. 

This is what he means by the use of "Primordial Sounds" to access a deep level of ourselves for healing, relaxation and balance. These sounds are mixed into the soundtrack in a way that they can be heard but not necessarily recognized for what they are by the rational-thinking mind which frequently tends to block healing and personal growth potential. Some of the nature sounds you hear are actually space sound recordings or human body sounds. 

3-D Psychoacoustic Processing and Acoustic Pacing
Brainwave entrainment is part of a larger biological function called "Biological Sympathetic Oscillation". Our biological "clock" sets itself to external cosmic events; day length cycles, full moon cycles and seasonal cycles to name a few. The body will set itself to the most powerful external pulse cycle it is exposed to. In this case we can create powerful sound frequencies pulsing at exact brainwave speeds and cause the brainwaves to alter themselves to match the sound frequencies - that is entrain themselves to the sound pulses.

This has formed the basis for another method Dr. Thompson developed for entraining the entire biological network in the body, which he called "Acoustic Pacing". In Acoustic Pacing he is taking nature sound recordings - recorded with special Psychoacoustic 3-D microphones - and slowing these recordings down over time in the soundtrack. Since all the audio memories stored in the brain from past experiences are 3-D sound memories, a 3-D soundtrack fools the brain into assuming these nature sounds are real. Since, as part of the larger world phenomenon of "Biological Sympathetic Oscillation", mentioned before, our bodies time themselves to larger nature cycles, when 3-D recordings of nature sounds are slowed down over time, the body automatically adjusts its internal timings accordingly and a global body-based entrainment of slowing down occurs. Brainwaves slow in response to the whole system slowing in this method. 

When these elements are combined together - relaxing music, nature sounds in 3-D slowing down over time, brainwave entrainment pulses built into the harmonics of the music and nature sounds - a more all inclusive and powerful relaxation response takes place in the whole organism.

Certain types of sounds and music have a proven effect in creating states of relaxation, balance, healing and visualization. Generally these include certain types of lyrical, flowing melodies and chord arrangements. Certain chord arrangements can create an atmosphere of peace, mystery, awe and openness. 

Physiologic Response to Vibro-Tactile Induction Technology
The obvious stress reduction benefits of listening to relaxing music are known, as mentioned above. The type of music Dr Thompson creates for each audio program, therefore, is such that the purpose or goal of that program "sweetens the pie", as it were, to help one to more easily attain the brainwave state desired and receive the subsequent benefits of that state of consciousness.

By delivering these sound frequencies through the body directly, an entirely different system of the body - spinal cord and areas of the brainstem and brain - are brought into play, with the possibility of a much deeper whole-body response. With this delivery system we have the possibility of direct cellular stimulation. Sound frequency pulse waves played directly into the body also has a profound effect on the nervous system. The entire posterior 1/3 of the spinal cord consists of nerve tract bundles whose sole purpose is the transmission of vibration sense data to the Brain Stem, Cerebellum, Pons, Medulla, Hippocampus/Limbic System (emotional processing areas) and various areas of the Cerebral Cortex. 

Far-reaching possibilities are inherent in using this type of vibrational technology in the areas of massage, energy work, physical healing, emotional release work, hypnosis, stress reduction, relaxation and meditation.

Please accept our current thanks now, however.  We appreciate your interest and ability to grasp the importance of this technology, the expertise and validity of Dr. Thompson"s work and that of our team noted above and the many others who help and will help to deliver this awesome product to interested Venues.                                     Our Current Sound Chair 

                                      Audio Visual Modulator (Light Glasses)

                                      Audio Visual Modulator (Light Glasses)

                         Some of the CD Choices and Headphones


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Does one get Brainwave Synchronization when listening to your CDs? 

Yes, brainwave synchronization is achieved when wearing headphones.  If you read some of the Testimonials shared with us, you will see many examples of brainwave synchronization.  Many contributors speak clearly of their moment of insight and awareness, of their moment of realization, their moment which brought about a significant change in their life, or the deep feeling of relaxation, peace, contentment, joy, love, etc.

If I do not use headphones, can I still benefit from your CDs?

Yes, definitely!  Great benefit comes when listening to any audio programs created by Dr. Jeffrey Thompson.  As background music, they form a relaxing and pleasant environment.  Greater benefit occurs, however, when you listen to the composition with good quality headphones.  Even more benefit occurs if you listen to his CDs with headphones and the Audio Visual Modulator. Maximum benefit is achieved when listening to his audio programs using headphones, the light glasses, and one of his body support sound delivery structures, such as the Sound Chair.  When combining all three, you are then using your three (3) Primary Modes of Learning  <<Visual - Auditory - Kinesthetic>>  What you hear is what you feel, what you feel is what you see, and what you see is what you hear.  You become the Sound/Light/Sensation, as it were.  It’s a unique way to fully integrate your brain in a multi-dimensional way -- an awesome experience – truly wonderful and healing.

When I go to bed and listen to Dr. Thompson’s music, must I wear headphones?

No, this is not necessary.  Hemispheric synchronization is not necessary for sleep.  It is helpful to place your stereo speakers on either side of your bed, however, to benefit from the 3-D stereo work of Dr. Thompson.  If this is not possible, then placing your player at the foot of your bed toward the middle of where you sleep is recommended. 

Do you have subliminal messages on your CDs?

No, there are no subliminal messages on any audio programs composed and produced by Dr. Jeffrey Thompson.  His audio programs are gentle but powerful enough to accomplish their goal without subliminal programming!

What is the difference between the Limited Edition Chair and the Home Edition Chair?

Nothing other than style and rarity! The Limited Edition Chair will have white leather and a unique chrome base signed by Dr. Jeffrey Thompson and the designer of the chair, Scott Gressitt. So catch them while you can, they are definitely a collectors choice!

What exercises should I do to achieve the brainwave state noted on your CDs?

No physical or mental exercises are needed to achieve the brainwave state noted for any of Dr. Jeffrey Thompson’s audio programs.  The music itself will enhance your ability to attain the brainwave state of that audio program.  Open receptivity is an important key.  Simply make yourself comfortable, place your headphones and a light blanket on yourself, start your CD player and simply follow the music.  Let it take you where it will.  If working with a specific concern, you may begin the session with this foremost in your mind, then relax and let it go into your subconscious mind as a silent question or request.  Follow the music, unattached to your concern, and see/watch what happens.  You may well be surprised at what comes to you during or after the session, in a dream at night or as an insight during the day.

Do you cover shipping costs?

Yes, we will cover shipping costs within the United States, but ask you to cover shipping or postage costs outside the USA.

I live outside of the United States, can your Sound Chair operate on our power supply?

Yes, we ship globally.  Transformers / electrical converter have been necessary in the past, but we believe we will resolve that challenge with a dual electrical option.  If you have a concern, do not hesitate to e-mail us - cnr@neuroacoustic.com.

How are your light glasses different from others on the market?

The Dr Jeff Audio/Visual Modulator w/ Light Glasses are driven directly by the sound and music you are playing.  Other light glasses are driven by specific programs which "ramp" the flashing of the lights slower or faster to entrain the brainwaves.  When you use the A/V Modulator you see what you are hearing.  Since what you are hearing is a compilation of Dr. Thompson's proprietary brainwave technology, his special light glasses translate this to your eyes and cause hemisphere synchronicity in the visual lobes of your brain in sync with the synchronicity of the hearing centers through the headphones. What you see is your own “light show” as determined by the rods and cones on your optic nerve and how your brain interprets the experience.  They are fun, enhance brainwave entrainment, and for many youngsters especially who have visual challenges, there is help.  Every "light show" is different even with the same music as we continually change and are at a different place, as it were, each time we use the glasses. You see what you hear…

Can any CDs be played through your Light Glasses?

Yes, any CD may be played through the Dr. Jeff Audio/Visual Modulator.  Dr. Jeffrey Thompson's audio programs have the most correct technology for using with the Light Glasses, however, any CD may be used.  Since the proprietary sound pulses in the soundtrack are also driving the lights in the glasses, you get a visual entrainment in sync with the auditory entrainment. This is the reason Dr. Thompson had to develop his own glasses. No other glasses on the market provided this pulse-driven ability.  He wanted to offer persons the tools to balance the visual and auditory centers of their brain simultaneously, and thus reap the benefit of that synchronization.  He accomplished that goal by creating the Audio/Visual Modulator with light glasses and making it available to interested parties.  (Editor’s note:  Although we know of no definitive problem, light glasses are generally counter-indicated for persons who have a seizure problem or who suffer from migraine headaches.)

Brainwave Entrainment and Hemisphere Synchronicity
This phenomenon of
hemisphere synchronicity is due to a quirk in how the brain processes
information and the physics phenomenon of the Critical bandwidth. When two
tones are tuned within 18% of one another (or within the critical bandwidth)
the brain cannot distinguish two separate tones, it hear one single tone with a
pulse within it. The speed of the pulse it hears is the difference between the
two tones. Through headphones, however, the opposite hemispheres, which process
sound information from each opposite ear, have to compare information in order
to hear the pulse. Actually the brain is manufacturing the pulse out of thin
air, moment by moment. When the hemispheres compare information, they synchronize
their activity: thus hemisphere synchronicity. 
We know from other
research efforts that brainwave synchronicity does not happen often and when it
does, it is only for an instant. We know it is associated with the
"aha" moment, the moment when the answer to a problem pops into
mind, in times of great inspiration, and certain high states of revelry and
meditation. With this new technological method of entraining brainwaves with
binaural beats using headphones, however, it is possible to float the brain in
this hemisphere synchronicity state for prolonged periods of time. Each time we
do this, it is like exercising a new brain function - which makes the brain
more able to engage this function as its normal repertoire of behavior. It is
like going to a gym on the inside and working the "muscle" of your
brain. 
Using sound in
these ways, it is possible to make profound changes in brainwave patterns and
states of consciousness, observable on brainwave mapping equipment (EEG), as
well as positive changes in the body, measurable with blood tests, bio-feedback
equipment and other sophisticated procedures. We are also able to influence the
core balance and functioning of the brain and central nervous system as a
whole. 
In a series of
recordings based on these principles I have used sound frequency patterns built
into the music that have been shown clinically to cause positive changes in
consciousness, brainwave and body function.
A good part of the
stress we all experience in the twentieth century is due to the advancements of
our own technology. This same technology, combined with our traditional
techniques for healing and achieving balance, may help neutralize the stress we
have created.

Sounds
from Space 
In 1989 we were approached by an aerospace engineer with sound recordings from
the Voyager spacecraft. These recordings were taken as Voyager passed by the
outer planets of our Solar System - Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune.
These were
recordings of charged electromagnetic particles (ions) in the magnetic fields
of these planets vibrating within the range of human hearing. What did they
sound like? They sound like dolphins, choirs of voices singing, crickets,
birds, Tibetan bowls, and ocean sounds, plus other sounds too strange to
identify, but which seem very familiar. 
It is these three
classes of sound ("Primordial Sounds", "Brainwave Entrainment"
and "multi-layered 3-D music") that are embedded in all Dr. Thompson's soundtracks and recordings to awaken the various levels of the subconscious
mind. 
This is what he
means by the use of "Primordial Sounds" to access a deep level of
ourselves for healing, relaxation and balance. These sounds are mixed into the

are actually space sound recordings or human body sounds. 
3-D
Psychoacoustic Processing and Acoustic Pacing
Brainwave entrainment is part of a larger biological function called
"Biological Sympathetic Oscillation". Our biological
"clock" sets itself to external cosmic events; day length cycles,
full moon cycles and seasonal cycles to name a few. The body will set itself to
the most powerful external pulse cycle it is exposed to. In this case we can
create powerful sound frequencies pulsing at exact brainwave speeds and cause
the brainwaves to alter themselves to match the sound frequencies - that is
entrain themselves to the sound pulses.
This has formed
the basis for another method Dr. Thompson developed for entraining the entire biological
network in the body, which he called "Acoustic Pacing". In Acoustic
Pacing he is taking nature sound recordings - recorded with special
Psychoacoustic 3-D microphones - and slowing these recordings down over time in
the soundtrack. Since all the audio memories stored in the brain from past
experiences are 3-D sound memories, a 3-D soundtrack fools the brain into
assuming these nature sounds are real. Since, as part of the larger world
phenomenon of "Biological Sympathetic Oscillation", mentioned before,
our bodies time themselves to larger nature cycles, when 3-D recordings of
nature sounds are slowed down over time, the body automatically adjusts its
internal timings accordingly and a global body-based entrainment of slowing
down occurs. Brainwaves slow in response to the whole system slowing in this
method. 
When these
elements are combined together - relaxing music, nature sounds in 3-D slowing
down over time, brainwave entrainment pulses built into the harmonics of the
music and nature sounds - a more all inclusive and powerful relaxation response
takes place in the whole organism.

sounds and music have a proven effect in creating states of relaxation,
balance, healing and visualization. Generally these include certain types of
lyrical, flowing melodies and chord arrangements. Certain chord arrangements
can create an atmosphere of peace, mystery, awe and openness.

Does one get Brainwave Synchronization when listening to your CDs? 
Yes, brainwave synchronization is achieved when wearing headphones.  If you read some of the Testimonials shared with us, you will see many examples of brainwave synchronization.  Many contributors speak clearly of their moment of insight and awareness, of their moment of realization, their moment which brought about a significant change in their life, or the deep feeling of relaxation, peace, contentment, joy, love, etc.
If I do not use headphones, can I still benefit from your CDs?
Yes, definitely!  Great benefit comes when listening to any audio programs created by Dr. Jeffrey Thompson.  As background music, they form a relaxing and pleasant environment.  Greater benefit occurs, however, when you listen to the composition with good quality headphones.  Even more benefit occurs if you listen to his CDs with headphones and the Audio Visual Modulator. Maximum benefit is achieved when listening to his audio programs using headphones, the light glasses, and one of his body support sound delivery structures, such as the Sound Chair.  When combining all three, you are then using your three (3) Primary Modes of Learning  <<Visual - Auditory - Kinesthetic>>  What you hear is what you feel, what you feel is what you see, and what you see is what you hear.  You become the Sound/Light/Sensation, as it were.  It’s a unique way to fully integrate your brain in a multi-dimensional way -- an awesome experience – truly wonderful and healing.
When I go to bed and listen to Dr. Thompson’s music, must I wear headphones?
No, this is not necessary.  Hemispheric synchronization is not necessary for sleep.  It is helpful to place your stereo speakers on either side of your bed, however, to benefit from the 3-D stereo work of Dr. Thompson.  If this is not possible, then placing your player at the foot of your bed toward the middle of where you sleep is recommended. 
Do you have subliminal messages on your CDs?
No, there are no subliminal messages on any audio programs composed and produced by Dr. Jeffrey Thompson.  His audio programs are gentle but powerful enough to accomplish their goal without subliminal programming!
What is the difference between the Limited Edition Chair and the Home Edition Chair?
Nothing other than style and rarity! The Limited Edition Chair will have white leather and a unique chrome base signed by Dr. Jeffrey Thompson and the designer of the chair, Scott Gressitt. So catch them while you can, they are definitely a collectors choice!
What exercises should I do to achieve the brainwave state noted on your CDs?
No physical or mental exercises are needed to achieve the brainwave state noted for any of Dr. Jeffrey Thompson’s audio programs.  The music itself will enhance your ability to attain the brainwave state of that audio program.  Open receptivity is an important key.  Simply make yourself comfortable, place your headphones and a light blanket on yourself, start your CD player and simply follow the music.  Let it take you where it will.  If working with a specific concern, you may begin the session with this foremost in your mind, then relax and let it go into your subconscious mind as a silent question or request.  Follow the music, unattached to your concern, and see/watch what happens.  You may well be surprised at what comes to you during or after the session, in a dream at night or as an insight during the day.

Do you cover shipping costs?
Yes, we will cover shipping costs within the United States, but ask you to cover shipping or postage costs outside the USA.
I live outside of the United States, can your Sound Chair operate on our power supply?
Yes, we ship globally.  Transformers / electrical converter have been necessary in the past, but we believe we will resolve that challenge with a dual electrical option.  If you have a concern, do not hesitate to e-mail us - cnr@neuroacoustic.com.
How are your light glasses different from others on the market?
The Dr Jeff Audio/Visual Modulator w/ Light Glasses are driven directly by the sound and music you are playing.  Other light glasses are driven by specific programs which "ramp" the flashing of the lights slower or faster to entrain the brainwaves.  When you use the A/V Modulator you see what you are hearing.  Since what you are hearing is a compilation of Dr. Thompson's proprietary brainwave technology, his special light glasses translate this to your eyes and cause hemisphere synchronicity in the visual lobes of your brain in sync with the synchronicity of the hearing centers through the headphones. What you see is your own “light show” as determined by the rods and cones on your optic nerve and how your brain interprets the experience.  They are fun, enhance brainwave entrainment, and for many youngsters especially who have visual challenges, there is help.  Every "light show" is different even with the same music as we continually change and are at a different place, as it were, each time we use the glasses. You see what you hear…
Can any CDs be played through your Light Glasses?
Yes, any CD may be played through the Dr. Jeff Audio/Visual Modulator.  Dr. Jeffrey Thompson's audio programs have the most correct technology for using with the Light Glasses, however, any CD may be used.  Since the proprietary sound pulses in the soundtrack are also driving the lights in the glasses, you get a visual entrainment in sync with the auditory entrainment. This is the reason Dr. Thompson had to develop his own glasses. No other glasses on the market provided this pulse-driven ability.  He wanted to offer persons the tools to balance the visual and auditory centers of their brain simultaneously, and thus reap the benefit of that synchronization.  He accomplished that goal by creating the Audio/Visual Modulator with light glasses and making it available to interested parties.  (Editor’s note:  Although we know of no definitive problem, light glasses are generally counter-indicated for persons who have a seizure problem or who suffer from migraine headaches.)

story:
I'm writing this for the purpose to live. Even though I am 70 years old and have some physical handicaps, I've never let that stop me from moving towards my dreams and aspirations. My family can only do so much and has supported me as much as they can. I am retired and on a fixed income; I never make it to the end of each month with my finances. Now, I've been diagnosed with liver and colon cancer. Previous to my diagnosis, I became physically ill with environmental illness. This has caused me to usurp traditional methods of medical treatment since they make me worse. I have found a doctor whose practice is called “The House of Gilead Holistic Renewal Centers”. He uses alternative healing methods for treating cancer. My medical insurance doesn't cover much of anything, let alone alternative healing of which it covers nothing.  It costs $100 per week just for a doctor's visit plus additional money for his supplements.

I came from a very troubled family because I am a 3rd generation Holocaust survivor. I have survived many traumatic situations throughout my childhood and into my adulthood. Due to a car accident, I am wheelchair bound. I've overcome so much in my life where I nearly could have died but didn't. Through my will and God's mercy, I have come through these experiences and want to share my story by writing a book to offer hope and inspiration to others in similar circumstances.

I am an individual who loves life. Before I became ill, I was an activist against things such as aerial pesticide spraying, GMO foods, and laws denying acccess to natural supplements. I also enjoy writing poetry and photography, both endeavors in which I have won many awards.

I am asking for $7500 (the cost of a year's worth of doctor visits and treatments) for my non-toxic and safe cancer treatments to stay alive so I can continue to write my book, share my poetry, get back to my photography, and just be me again. With your help I can do these things I have dreamed to accomplish in my life. Thank you and God Bless you for any help you can offer me. Anything is appreciated.

 To Life, To Life, L'Chaim

Ronda Dee

story:
The Summary

My name is Laurynn Ball and I am in 7th grade. I am new to the sport of water polo but know it is something I love. I have been selected as one of 120 athletes nation wide, to go to a special Water Polo Camp

I am raising funds to send myself to water polo camp for 14 and under girls at the Olympic Training Center in Colorado Springs, Colorado.

Your contributions will help pay for camp fees and travel expenses. 

What We Need

We need $375 for the camp fees and I am looking for additional funding of at least $400 for airfare. (The sooner we buy the ticket the cheaper it will be).

Any additonal funds that are above our goal and not used for this camp or airfare I will be donating to the Central Valley Food Bank upon my return.

The Impact

USA Water Polo is hosting its annual Holiday Water Polo Camp for Coaches and Age Group Development. This event will take place at the United States Olympic Training Center.  Since its inception, this event has proven to be a unique and valuable experience in the development of the best 7th and 8th grade water polo athletes around the nation.  This camp allows athletes from around the country have a chance to come together and learn from some of the best coaches and athletes USA Water Polo has to offer.  Only 120 eighth- grade and under athletes nationwide are selected to attend. There are a few scholarships that will be awarded during this camp and I hope to be one of the few that are selected to recieve one.

With your help and contribution I will be able to accomplish two goals:

First I will gain experience that will better myself as an athlete and greatly improve my opportunity to  get into the college of my choice. It is never to early to be thinking of college. Although I do not know what I will study yet, I do know that I would love to play water polo for whichever college I attend. 

Second I will be able to help those that are in need. When I return we will be closer to Christmas. I hope that the contributions will exceed my expectations and that I will be able to donate enough money to the Central Valley Food Bank to help several families in need. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help. So spread the word to family, friends, and all those who love water polo and helping those in need. Every dollar counts. Send the link via email or post to your facebook account. I am so excited to have this opportunity.  THANK YOU!!!

story:
My name Is Steven. I'm a 60 year old divorced male in Greenville SC with 2 forms of incurable cancer. I resently lost my job and my insurance. At this time I have no income and I've applyed for disabilty, but this process takes from 6 months to a year or maybe longer. Both of my cancer doctors say I should still have a few years left if I can keep my check ups and my treatments when needed. I have prostate cancer that has spread to my ribs and they keep  a very close eye on my PSA levels, and I get shots every 3 months that take away my testosterone production. Testosterone helps the cancer to spread but lack of it makes me feel tired and wore out all the time. I've been through 8 weeks of radiation also. When my Lymphoma kicks up again, I have to go back to chemo which makes me very sick. I just received my frist bill to keep my insurance from my last job and its 780.00 then 465.00 a month after that.

I'm asking for funding to pay for my insurance and living expences along with my car payments ( I only have 2 left ) medical and dental bills, and medications. And when all this is over and I get on disability I'd love to take a vacation and get away for a while if theres any money left.

I have no place to turn to so I thought I'd try this. All comments are true and correct. Thank you for taking the time to read my story.

Yours truly, Steven M

story:
Introduction 


We are a small dynamic team of highly motivated partners, professionals and volunteers working around the world in:


  • Toronto, Canada (Head Office)

  • Maryland, United States

  • Los Angeles, California

  • Bangalore, India & Lahore

  • Islamabad, Pakistan


In addition, our Board of Advisers join us from five major continents including Europe, Asia, Africa, South America and North America. 


Our team members include business, technology and healthcare specialists. We combined our expertise to develop a unique digital healthcare platform providing online medical opinions from world-class, board certified and pre-vetted doctors and specialists practicing exclusively in North America to patients around the world.


The Problem We Aim to Solve


While the idea is to propagate exceptional healthcare to all corners of the globe, Founder Nauman Jaffar and Dr. Asim Cheema conceived this timely solution in 2014, after a personal tragedy struck Nauman close to his heart.


His beloved aunt who was like a mother to him was misdiagnosed with stomach flu while in fact she had stage three ovarian cancer. The true cause of her illness was tragically detected late, nearly three months after the initial false diagnosis. Failing to receive a timely "accurate" diagnosis, she passed away within six months.


This was the moment Nauman decided to step down from his high profile corporate life and fully commit to developing a solution. A solution preventing anyone in the world from suffering a loss from medical misdiagnosis by connecting world-class specialists to patient doorsteps, or simply a click away.


Defining Medical Misdiagnosis Solutions


Today, after nearly one and a half years of diligent effort and bootstrapping, we have developed a platform summarized below in terms of our simple value proposition. Our personal efforts have laid a foundation worth building greatness upon, a cost we have personally funded through loans and even second home mortgages. This is how strongly we feel about our mission, and how deeply we care.



YourDoctors.Online offers a myriad of benefits to our clients and patients. Our medical opinion solutions boast proven credibility, HIPPA and PHIPPA compliance and premier affiliations with North American hospitals, among other benefits. Get a more detailed view into our unique patient platform below. 


Our team of partnered doctors and specialists cover a wide range of medical services and fields. YourDoctors.Online doctors and world-class medical specialists benefit through a dynamic global patient outreach. They also have the opportunity to increase their revenue while helming their own virtual practice. Take a look at the practitioner features we offer below. 


Presently, the platform is fully developed at https://yourdoctors.online. However, our mission is not yet complete. We need your help to commercialize and make this platform accessible to a wider audience, extending expert medical opinions to as many people and patients around the world. With approximately 100 plus doctors covering more than 30 different specialties, we are ready to serve the world through this social enterprise. Many of our expert physicians have also offered their services as charity, because we strive to save lives with medical opinions that matter. Think of us as "Doctors Without Borders," or a "global virtual hospital" eager to help those in desperate need. By arming patients with a second medical diagnosis and treatment plan our mission to intervene in possibly life threatening situations can become a powerful reality and movement.


What We Need to Make an Impact and What You Get as a Result


First and foremost, we need funding. In order to continue our mission, we need a minimum of $25,000 to be utilized in marketing our platform to different parts of the world. Our team has tested the market carefully for three months solely using our own funds, concluding that every $25 spent secures one patient registration.


Your $25,000 funding will allow us to reach our initial goal of 1,000 deserving patients in need. Additionally, your funding will assist in our goal of attracting nearly 35,000 unique users to our website. Our pilot program had promising success, where a $10,000 investment reached 13,000 unique users. 


The funding will be allocated primarily to our Google (1st with 60%) and Facebook (2nd with 20%) campaigns. Our future LinkedIn campaign has projected potential as well, with an allocation of 10%. A more detailed scheduling of funds is provided below.  


The following data and projections are an estimate of our expenses organized in priority and sequence of use:


  • Google Ads: $10,000 for 2 months with an average of $0.6 cents per click

  • Facebook & LinkedIn: $5,000 with an average of $1 per click

  • Reader's Digest advertisement campaign of up to $5,000 ( http://www.rd.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2016/02/2016_RD_Mediakit_FINAL_12.15.pdf )

  • Feature on Silicon review as best managed startup: $2,000

  • Campaign utilizing top 3 key influencers: $3,000, eg., Hassan Nisar for $2,000 An unbiased political figure in South Asia, the Middle East, Europe and North America with 1.7 million followers and 300,000 daily visits.


Are You Ready to Save Lives and Make a Global Impact?


  • This campaign’s target is to reach people who want to join us on a journey to help save lives with a focus on timely and accurate medical diagnoses from world-class specialists. 

  • It’s for people who are passionate about helping others, making quality healthcare accessible to everyone, regardless of location and situation. We offer services for free or at a discounted rate, and by dropping our name and utilizing coupon codes, you can utilize the following perks:


  • A backing of $10 will get your name and photo featured on our social media accounts reaching over 3,000 followers. You will appear on our Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter pages with a unique YourDoctors.Online banner reading, “I contributed towards helping save someone's life.” You will be sent a link to the posts via your social media accounts as well. 

  • A backing of $25 will get you a free general medical opinion valued at $49. You can use or share the discount code with someone else as well.

  • A backing of $150 gets you four general medical opinions for FREE valued at $200.

  • A backing of $400 gives you 100% off a specialist’s medical opinion valued at $500.

  • A backing of $600 earns you two free specialist medical opinions valued at $1000.


The Impact of Your Funding is Profound


To understand the potential size of the problem, review a few simple statistics on how often medical misdiagnoses occur below. The reputable nature of this startling data is compiled from JAMA, Johns Hopkins University, Harvard Medical School and other peer reviewed academic studies conducted in the United States. IBM Healthcare, and other reputable research institutions compliment these studies conducted over past decades as well.


 

An Invaluable Mission Making a Global Healthcare Impact


  • Just like water, clean air, food, security, home and several other basic life necessities, we believe quality health care should be accessible to each and every individual in the world, regardless of geographical boundaries.

  • Misdiagnosis is a serious global problem currently under represented and needs to be addressed.

  • While misdiagnosis is the 3rd leading cause of death in the U.S., there is a 1 in 3 chance the treatment you receive might not be proper. Our solution provides an excellent option to seek a confidential, comprehensive and credible medical opinion that helps in the following key ways



Risks & Challenges


People value transparency. Being open and standing out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles faced on the way to achieving a goal is paramount.


It is possible that with 50% off on perks with lesser funding, we might not get any funds for actually marketing the service. In this case, we are happy to know people who care are using our platform. As mitigation we have extended our funding to personal loans, and actually using our homes and other assets as collateral to widen our mission’s reach globally.


Other Ways You Can Help


Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Don't forget to help us spread the word by sharing our campaign or our website YourDoctors.Online on your social media. Share with people the problem we are attempting to solve.


A simple message like the below examples can make an impact as well:


1. Help spread the word and possibly save someone's life with proper diagnosis - visit YourDoctors.Online.


2. Life gives you a second chance – it’s called tomorrow. Now you can give someone else a health minded second chance by accessing YourDoctors.Online where up to 68% of patients have discovered a second opinion that has changed their diagnosis, treatment or surgery options. An opinion that matters at www.yourdoctors.online


Become our ambassadors and help patients around the world access top specialists from North America. Share our message using Indiegogo and make a global impact in healthcare today.

story:
ABOUT OUR PROJECT

We are Bir Kaur and Ram Rung Kaur and we are Kundalini Yoga Teachers (certified by Yoga Alliance & Kundalini Research Institute).  About a year ago we started producing 2 Instructional Yoga DVDs:  "Prenatal Kundalini Yoga" with Bir Kaur Khalsa, and "Kundalini Yoga" with Ram Rung Kaur. 

We wanted to create Yoga DVDs that truly express the experience to taking a great Kundalini Yoga class by delivering the highest quality teaching experience. Moreover, as a filmmaker, Ram Rung Kaur wanted to make sure these DVDs were produced with the utmost professional video quality.  The result will be a truly enjoyable yoga class that can be experienced while practicing from the comfort of your own home. 

 

WHERE WE ARE NOW 

We reached out to our local community to support us with this project and successfully raised $2743 towards our video production on the grassroots level so far. With this money we were able to shoot high quality HD footage of our both DVD classes. Bir Kaur's DVD (see trailer) has been edited and is undergoing a review process by KRI (the Kundalini Research Institute) while Ram Rung Kaur's DVD (see trailer) is still in underway in the editing process. 

 

OUR GOAL 

Our current goal is to raise an additional $1500 to bring these DVDs to completion. This remaining money will go towards final post production costs, reproduction, packaging and distribution. 

We are asking for donations ranging from $25 to $1000 towards this production. In return you will receive copies of the DVDs upon completion and various DVD credits. 

Any donation amount that you make will help us get closer to our goal. All funds raised by the end of our fundraising campaign will go directly towards covering these costs. If we can raise our entire goal of $1500 by mid November, we will be able to fund the DVDs in full, and complete them for January 2013! 

 

HEAL YOURSELF, HEAL THE WORLD!  

Kundalini Yoga is an incredibly healing and uplifting practice that is accessible to all. In this time of great change on the planet and increasing demands of daily living, Kundalini Yoga brings the practitioner into a state of health and balance on the physical, mental and spiritual levels.

By supporting these DVDs, not only will you receive a great healing resource for yourself, but you will also be a part of making these DVDs a resource for others to receive the benefits. Together we can heal the world, one Yogi at a time! 

 

Kundalini Yoga DVD with Ram Rung Kaur

Join Ram Rung Kaur for a fun and powerful experience of Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan. Kundalini is a mind, body, spirit integrated practice accessible to students of all levels.  This DVD class focuses on the yoga set “Withstand the Pressure of Time” and supports you to find your center and gracefully manage increasing demands of fast-paced daily living.  Create an inner strength to match any outer pressure with a dynamic blend of movement, breath work, mantra and meditation.  

This class will leave you feeling balanced, revitalized and inspired to practice with this great DVD again and again!

This 75 min DVD includes:

An introduction to the practice, Warm up exercises, Yoga set to“Withstand the Pressure of Time, Deep relaxation & "Kirtan Kriya" Meditation

 

Kundalini Prenatal Yoga DVD with Bir Kaur Khalsa

Kundalini Yoga is a sacred science with a deep well of teachings for pregnancy and motherhood. Combining the gentle strengthening of physical yoga, the power of breath and the depth and peace of meditation, you will deepen the connection to your own body, to yourself as a mother and to the child who is growing within.  Stretch, breathe, strengthen, laugh, dance and relax as you journey into motherhood!

This DVD provides a great yoga class for woman at any stage of their pregnancy, is also can continue to be used after the pregnancy to continue to build and maintain vital health. 

* This DVD class is also a great experience for anyone (woman or man) who wants to deepen their understanding of the sacred journey of pregnancy through a great yoga class.  

This 75 min DVD includes:

Warm up exercises, Exercise series for "strengthening the pelvic floor", Deep relaxation & "Ra Ma Da Sa" healing meditation

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us get the word out about this fundraising campaign to your communities through email, websites, newsletters and  to your online social circles on facebook, twitter, blogs, and so forth. The more people we can reach with this campaign, the more successful we will be in completing these DVDs. 

 

GRATITUDE  

There Have been so many individual and organizations that have supported to bring these DVD productions together. We are so grateful. We couldn't have done this without you...

Special Thanks: 

The Teachings of Yogi Bhajan, Kundalini Research Institute (KRI), Tarn Taran Kaur of the Conscious Pregnancy Manuel, Yoga West Vancouver, Radha Yoga, Spirit Voyage

Productions Team: 

Co-Producers: MA Birth & Sacred Hand Productions 

Director: Martina Comstock of Sacred Hand Productions

Director of Photography/ Video Production: Michael Julian Berz /A DANCING EYE 

Executive Producers: Ian Wenig & Eirin Cecilie

Sound: Kirsten Aubrey (Sweet Currant Productions) & Patrick Francis  

Location & Manager / Assisant Camera: Darryl Baybutt  
 
Assistant Editor: Rohaan Daroowala 
 
Color Correction: George Faulkner 
 
Cover Design: Tera Kaur

Musics: 

Nirinjan Kaur, Livtar Pheonix, Bachan Kaur, Gurunam Singh, Ryan O'Flarety, Satya Kaur 

Contributors: 

Ian Wenig, Eirin Cecilie, George Faulkner, Colin Ross, Hardev Singh, Carla Fox, Sasha Webb, Anonamous, Hari 8 Singh Khalsa, Satwinder Kaur, Sue Agrios, Julie Wall, Isabelle Bordeur, Laura Andrews, Laura Brown, Windy Wang, Bhagwati Kaur, Selin / Bani Kaur, Rai Kaur, Bachan Kaur
story_txt:
ABOUT OUR PROJECT
We are Bir Kaur and Ram Rung Kaur and we are Kundalini Yoga Teachers (certified by Yoga Alliance & Kundalini Research Institute).  About a year ago we started producing 2 Instructional Yoga DVDs:  "Prenatal Kundalini Yoga" with Bir Kaur Khalsa, and "Kundalini Yoga" with Ram Rung Kaur. 
We wanted to create Yoga DVDs that truly express the experience to taking a great Kundalini Yoga class by delivering the highest quality teaching experience. Moreover, as a filmmaker, Ram Rung Kaur wanted to make sure these DVDs were produced with the utmost professional video quality.  The result will be a truly enjoyable yoga class that can be experienced while practicing from the comfort of your own home. 
 
WHERE WE ARE NOW 
We reached out to our local community to support us with this project and successfully raised $2743 towards our video production on the grassroots level so far. With this money we were able to shoot high quality HD footage of our both DVD classes. Bir Kaur's DVD (see trailer) has been edited and is undergoing a review process by KRI (the Kundalini Research Institute) while Ram Rung Kaur's DVD (see trailer) is still in underway in the editing process. 
 
OUR GOAL 
Our current goal is to raise an additional $1500 to bring these DVDs to completion. This remaining money will go towards final post production costs, reproduction, packaging and distribution. 
We are asking for donations ranging from $25 to $1000 towards this production. In return you will receive copies of the DVDs upon completion and various DVD credits. 
Any donation amount that you make will help us get closer to our goal. All funds raised by the end of our fundraising campaign will go directly towards covering these costs. If we can raise our entire goal of $1500 by mid November, we will be able to fund the DVDs in full, and complete them for January 2013! 
 
HEAL YOURSELF, HEAL THE WORLD!  
Kundalini Yoga is an incredibly healing and uplifting practice that is accessible to all. In this time of great change on the planet and increasing demands of daily living, Kundalini Yoga brings the practitioner into a state of health and balance on the physical, mental and spiritual levels.
By supporting these DVDs, not only will you receive a great healing resource for yourself, but you will also be a part of making these DVDs a resource for others to receive the benefits. Together we can heal the world, one Yogi at a time! 
 
Kundalini Yoga DVD with Ram Rung Kaur
Join Ram Rung Kaur for a fun and powerful experience of Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan. Kundalini is a mind, body, spirit integrated practice accessible to students of all levels.  This DVD class focuses on the yoga set “Withstand the Pressure of Time” and supports you to find your center and gracefully manage increasing demands of fast-paced daily living.  Create an inner strength to match any outer pressure with a dynamic blend of movement, breath work, mantra and meditation.  
This class will leave you feeling balanced, revitalized and inspired to practice with this great DVD again and again!
This 75 min DVD includes:
An introduction to the practice, Warm up exercises, Yoga set to“Withstand the Pressure of Time, Deep relaxation & "Kirtan Kriya" Meditation
 
Kundalini Prenatal Yoga DVD with Bir Kaur Khalsa
Kundalini Yoga is a sacred science with a deep well of teachings for pregnancy and motherhood. Combining the gentle strengthening of physical yoga, the power of breath and the depth and peace of meditation, you will deepen the connection to your own body, to yourself as a mother and to the child who is growing within.  Stretch, breathe, strengthen, laugh, dance and relax as you journey into motherhood!
This DVD provides a great yoga class for woman at any stage of their pregnancy, is also can continue to be used after the pregnancy to continue to build and maintain vital health. 
* This DVD class is also a great experience for anyone (woman or man) who wants to deepen their understanding of the sacred journey of pregnancy through a great yoga class.  
This 75 min DVD includes:
Warm up exercises, Exercise series for "strengthening the pelvic floor", Deep relaxation & "Ra Ma Da Sa" healing meditation
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Please help us get the word out about this fundraising campaign to your communities through email, websites, newsletters and  to your online social circles on facebook, twitter, blogs, and so forth. The more people we can reach with this campaign, the more successful we will be in completing these DVDs. 
 
GRATITUDE  
There Have been so many individual and organizations that have supported to bring these DVD productions together. We are so grateful. We couldn't have done this without you...

story:
Paula is 26, and doesn't qualify for insurance of any kind.


At one time Paula was a very heavy drug user, she's been clean and sober for more than 4 years now but the damage had already been done. The picture is of her actual teeth, there are infections in her mouth as well and if one were to burst it could quite easily kill her.

Beyond the quite serious risks medically, her teeth obviously are a great hinderance to her life in all aspects. She is in constant pain, she can only eat certain food as she can't chew very well, and her teeth have effected her self esteem to the point that she doesn't leave the house unless she has to and even then avoid speaking. Even with family and her few close friends who know how bad they are, she refuses to smile, she's ashamed of the condition of her teeth and it's cause her to become very depressed.

She lives with her disabled mother who suffers from rheumatoid arthritis and recently had an amputation done on below the knee, so money is scarce even though she works two jobs. Her father is in federal prison and has been for the past 14 years. She struggles just to take care of her self and her mother. She has taken care of her mother since she was 12. Her mother feels horrible that there is nothing she can do to help her daughter. We've tried everything there is to try, and unfortunately this is our last option.

We are not asking for money to get anything fancy done with her teeth. We aren't going to get cosmetic dentistry or caps, we plan on going the cheapest route possible which is complete extraction of each tooth and dentures. Because of the current condition of her teeth the extraction must be done by an oral surgeon.

Please help us save Paula's life and get her the dental work she desperately needs to save her life. The money will go towards having all teeth removed, getting dentures, and for any medications she may be required to take, the funds donated are going to a relatives paypal account.



If you require any further information or pictures please email me at newteeth4paula@gmail.com

story:
THE WORTHWHILE MILE

The Worthwhile Mile is all about creating opportunities for people to engage in active, service-oriented adventures dedicated to improving awareness and support for worthy causes.

This summer, the WM will deliver 3 long-distance cycling trips to generate support for the field of Anaplastology:

  • WSEF - Denver to Durango, June 2-8
  • Chi Ride - Chicago / North Shore, September 7
  • IAA - Nashville to Asheville, September 20-26


WHO AM I, WHY DO I CARE?

My name is Yolondra Yarborough. Thank you for letting your curiosity bring you to this campaign.

I am a leader on this year's WSEF Ride from Denver to Durango, CO.

Being a part of this initiative is one way I can combine my love of cycling, my desire to challenge myself, and my personal mission to use my energy and health to support a worthy cause -- the advancement of Anaplastology -- a field that combines science, art, and technology for prosthetic treatment of  patients who have suffered severe disfigurement due to cancer, traumatic injury, abuse/violence, or congenital origin.

Please support me in raising awareness and funds for a field dedicated to restoring quality of life.  Please take a moment to learn about Anaplastology and share with others. Thank you in advance for your time and support.

- Yo Yarborough, WM Leader - WSEF Ride


------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE NITTY GRITTY: 

What is Anaplastology? It is a field that combines science, art, and technology in order to create facial or somatic (body) prostheses for patients who have suffered severe disfigurement due to cancer, traumatic injury, or congenital origin. Prosthetic treatment provides an alternative when surgical reconstruction is unachievable or not desired. Most importantly, it offers the possibility of some functional and psychological rehabilitation that is vital to a patient's well-being.

Many people, myself included, have never heard of anaplastology or don't a have a clear understanding of what this type of treatment involves. Unfortunately, this lack of awareness also exists among a considerable proportion of health care professionals. As a result, many patients are not informed about prosthetic rehabilitation as a potential avenue for treatment, and often those who may benefit from a prosthesis are not referred to an anaplastologist. Can you imagine being a burn victim or losing your eye to cancer, and going years before learning that you could have received care had you only been told about it?

You can help! There are less than 200 anaplastologists practicing worldwide--they make up a small group of talented specialists who need your help to educate the world about existing patient resources. Your support will benefit not only anaplastology patients, but also the growth of the field. It is our hope that The Worthwhile Mile will bring attention to this important clinical practice, while also generating support for its advancement through research and education.


Why is it important that we succeed in executing the WM 2014? 

The WM is at the foundation of forming a non-profit organization focused on: 

  • organizing service-oriented, active adventures
  • educating the world about under-represented or poorly known patient populations
  • educating patients about services and opportunities available to them
  • improving awareness about patient needs
  • increasing support for research and education to advance services and improve quality of life

The mission of this initiative is to increase advocacy for patient populations and health topics that are less understood, under-researched and/or under-represented. 

This year, our focus is on soft-tissue prosthetic patients for whom surgical reconstruction is either unachievable or not desired by the patient. WM 2014 rides campaign for these patients by increasing awareness and support for Anaplastology. 

What's on the horizon?  The Worthwhile Mile combines Health Promotion through physically-engaging adventure with Social Advocacy by creating opportunities to educate others about the unique needs of less-know/under-represented populations. 

Associating one's adventure with a cause...

  • motivates the adventure,
  • brings attention to the cause, and
  • produces new, informed advocates! 

How does YOUR CONTRIBUTION make an IMPACT this year?

  • Remember, every dollar donated helps us to execute this summer's three rides (WSEF, CHI, IAA).
  • For the WSEF & IAA rides, all riders commit to fund-raise $1000. That means we have the potential to raise both awareness and funds for facial and body prosthetic rehabilitation, aka Anaplastology.
  • The success of this summer's rides will permit the Worthwhile Mile to establish an organizational structure from which it can extend its support to more and more worthy causes.
  • Your contributions will be in part be donated directly to the Walther Spohn Education Fund and used to offset the expenses of: 
  1. Organization & Leadership Development (NPO Incorporation & 501c3 Application processes; legal & financial services) 
  2. Support Vehicle & Equipment Transport 
  3. Food & Overnight Provisions
  4. Liability Coverage
Every dollar towards our goal amount is necessary, appreciated, and will absolutely contribute to the success of this initiative.

Thank you in advance for your support!


Sincerest thanks, 

Yolondra Yarborough

WM Leader - WSEF Ride

Visit WORTHWHILEMILE.COM

------------------------------ Detail - WM 2014 Rides  ----------------------------

WSEF - Denver to Durango, June 2-8

  • Supporting the Walter Spohn Education Fund (WSEF) research and education initiatives in Facial and Somato (body) Prosthetics

Chi Ride - Chicago / North Shore, September 7

  • Supporting the development and execution of The Worthwhile Mile

IAA - Nashville to Asheville, September 21-26

  • Supporting the International Anaplastology Association (IAA), which promotes quality patient care by supporting the development of best practices in anaplastology through educational conferences, networking, publication, and advocacy opportunities

----------------------- Detail - Organizational Background ---------------------

The WM Organizing Team includes: 

  • Erin Stevens, WM founder and Lead Organizer,  Small Business Owner/Trained Anaplastologist; Chicago, IL; WM Trip Leader 2014
  • Kelly Kraft - Freelance Project Manager, New York; WM Trip Leader 2014, Bike & Build Trip Leader 2010, 2013, Climate Ride Trip Leader 2013
  • Dr. Kelli Stevens-Selbst, DPM, MS - St. Joseph's Medical Center - Houston, TX
  • Michael Collins - North Carolina; WM Trip Leader 2014; Bike & Build Trip Leader 2013
  • Yolondra Yarborough - Chicago, IL; WM 2014 Trip Leader

story:
My brother, Jeremy Van Bortel (right), was diagnosed with IgA Nephropathy, also known as Berger's Disease.  He showed no symptoms for several years, and unexpectedly entered into end-stage renal failure in September of 2011.  He was then placed on dialysis, and currently performs peritoneal dialysis at home, for 10+ hours per day, 7 days a week. 

Research shows that dialysis is lifesaving, but offers only a temporary solution. Dialysis performs only 10% of the function of a typical kidney. Over time, this treatment takes its toll on other vital organs. Jeremy's outlook with a kidney transplant is extremely promising. A transplant will free him from his dialysis and give him a real chance for a happy and healthy life.  

My youngest brother, Bradon West (left), has courageously volunteered to undergo this transplant surgery to give Jeremy an opportunity for a better quality of life. These two young men will undergo their procedure on September 9th, 2014.  The recovery time for surgery of this type is 6-8 weeks for the recipient, and equally as long for the donor. The financial implications attributed to this act of kindness will be significant.

We look to you, family and friends, to help us support my brothers on their road to recovery.  In addition to this campaign a benefit will be held, on August 17th, 2014, at the American Legion in Canandaigua, New York.  More specific details will follow.

 For everyone that knows these two, it goes without saying that they are both self-less and giving.  They will need our emotional, mental, and financial support in the coming months as they progress through recovery. Our family greatly appreciates the time you have spent to hear our story, and also any contributions that you can provide to our cause.  

Also visit us on Facebook for informational updates; Chance for Jeremy

Thank you kindly for your support!

Nathan Van Bortel
