story:
What Is it?   An Integrative health retreat that is either one day or overnight.


Why this Retreat?  To learn simple techniques designed to ease the burden of symptoms, while improving quality of life for those living with cancer, or caring for someone with cancer.

Benefits: 

  • Relieve Anxiety
  • Reduce Fatigue
  • Reduce Side-effects of treatment


What It's not:

  • Medical Treatment
  • Alternative Treatment



What can you expect at the retreat:

  1. Gentle yoga and body movement
  2. Easy meditation for everyone
  3. Nutritional Support and Guidance
  4. A Variety of Positive and Fun Sessions




The Judith L. Rogers Health Society for Cancer Care is holding its first annual Cancer Care Retreat this summer, August 23rd – 25th.  Hosted by Camp Fire Southeast Michigan, the retreat will be held at Camp Wathana in Holly, MI.  For more information please contact Nikki Rogers at (248) 397-4653 ornikki.rogers@jlr-ihscc.org.

What is Needed:

We would like to brand our event, and create an environment for practitioners to be successful.  My dad's story, was that he went through three different medical systems  within a 100 mile radius.  It wasn't until his third hospital system in our small town, that he was introduced to mindfulness, nutrition through an integrative doctor, yoga and qigong.  He's learned that certain foods interact with chemotherapy, and that some foods feed cancer and help it grow..  (Stay away from sugar.).  With this $15,000 we are going to be able to offer highly nutritional foods that support integrative medicine, and build more connections within our community at our first retreat hosted and co-sponsored by Camp Fire of Southeast Michigan.

There are numerous medical journals supporting integrative medicine.  The CEO of Aetna Insurance has been investigating integrative medicine.  It's my goal to help people like my father have better access and information to some really amazing people.  This $15,000 can help communicate our goals and ideals for people interested in more.

If we don't quite meet our intended goal, we'll still be well on our way to bringing the Retreat to Life. If we raise more than our intended goal, on the other hand, we'll be able to support more opportunities for integrative health.

 That's because for each page of the series we need 

  • Funding to Cover Operational Costs such as Marketing/Public Relations, Human Resources, and etc
  • Funding to Cover Food For Participants over the weekend
  • Grant opportunities for those that can not afford items such as this

 

The retreat is scheduled for August 23-25th. 

 

The Impact

Community

The Quality of Life for those that have been treated for cancer, and members of their family, is sometimes diminished due to stress, anxiety, medical treatment, and the change in definition of what healthy means.  Patients, families and friends need a resource in which they can find peace, and kindness through a network of individuals interested in treating the whole-body - mind, body and soul.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't afford a donation? Another important way you can help ensure the success of our retreat and new non-profit is by spreading the word about our campaign.

Share my Website - www.jlr-ihscc.org

 

Sign up to Participate or Volunteer Your Time

 

Thanks so much!

 

Remember to use Indiegogo to share this on facebook, linkedin, twitter and etc.

story:
What Is Spacefish®?


Spacefish is Chris' passion. The new design of this flashgun is his creation and it is work he is immensely dedicated to. The addition of the flexible neck not only gives the user more scope for creativity but also makes it fun to use. The project has been about making photography fun since day one.

Chris' drive and determination have been steering this project thus far, and now it has come to the point where we need your help. Spacefish needs to be tooled and produced for you guys to get it in your hands, and on your cameras. We ask that you give a little, give a lot, or give what you can to help spacefish get off the ground.

Our dream is to see spacefish on the shelves and in the hands of photographers and enthusiasts like you. To create a more fun environment for todays photographer and to make it easy and effective to light your images.

So, why crowd-funding? Why Indiegogo?

The Indiegogo community has been so supportive in the progress of many inspiring projects, making them a success and a reality. Unlike 'big company' campaigns we don't have an established company behind with masses funds to invest, we are a young start-up, UK company with limited funds. However Spacefish® has been designed from the very beginning to be inexpensive to produce and assemble, and mass production will lower the price further.

For this reason we hope to demonstrate that the market is ready for this kind of device. A crowd-funding campaign is for us, a good starting point, because it will act as a reality check for us, it will demonstrate the need for this in the photography world, and will spread the word about Spacefish, allowing us to gather resources and build a photographic community around it. We also believe that the future of photography is wide open to projects like this and we have so many ideas to give to it.

As a UK project Spacefish® needs the help of the very people that understand and appreciate the relevance of technologically-improved photographic equipment. Funds will be used to start-up the production process and R&D for further product innovation and engineering, allowing us to ship Spacefish in approximately 4 months.


We are so excited to be moving ahead with this project and striving to bring the Spacefish to your cameras as soon as we can.

As a business we have set ourselves some goals if this project is successful. We are looking to provide jobs to the local community and will hire, skilled and dedicated staff to further the Hink brand and release more products in the coming year. We are proud to be a UK business are pushing for the project to be made, not just in cheapest way possible, but the best. The Manufacture will be given only to the companies who can make the best of our design.

We hope you keep up to date with us as we go on.

A breakdown of some key features you can enjoy -



Here are some Specifications:

  • Remote Functionality
  • Yes
  • Guide Number
  • GN 109′/33m at ISO 100 at 35mm.
  • Flash Exposure Control
  • Manual Controls
  • Other Available Functions
  • Test Firing
  • Monitor Pre-flashes
  • Built in Modelling Light (LED High power)
  • Minimum Recycling Time
  • 0.8sec. (approx.)
  • Power ON/OFF
  • Press the power button for approx. 0.3 sec. to turn the Spacefish on or oﬀ.
  • Required Power Source
  • Built in 3000mah 3.7v Li-Po Battery(possibly still growing!)
  • Charging
  • Micro USB charging cable and USB plug supplied with unit when purchased.
  • Optional Power Supply
  • Via Mod-FAS Micro connection.
  • Flash-ready Indicator
  • Test Button illuminates – ready to flash.
  • Custom Setting
  • AF-Assist Illumination
  • Wireless Flash Modes
  • Wireless Radio via Mod-FAS (available 2014)
  • S1 mode
  • S2 mode(ignores red-eye reduction flash)
  • Supplied Accessories
  • Space Dock old shoe (SDC-001)
  • Diffuser filter (SDF-001)
  • *Supplied accessories may differ depending on country or area.


Vs.


How Big Is it?



Design


Using some of the most up-to-date software in the product design industry we have created the, in our honest opinion, the ultimate in flashgun design.

Using virtual prototyping design tools we have reduced our ‘time to market’ greatly. Without using time consuming physical prototypes, we have narrowed down the issues in the development of the spacefish much more efficiently than could previously be achieved.

Our investors and business partners, Wildfire Solutions and MicroCAD have provided the much needed additional resources and further expertise to create this product in the ambitious time frame we had set out to achieve. Using Autodesk® products as our sole base for creation we have been able to test durability and reliability in our product efficiently and with speed, as well as creating the virtual models necessary to make Spacefish ’come to life’.

We have achieved this with the help of some of the best and brightest engineers in the design industry. David Cassapi (M Eng) heading up our mechanical engineering team; Nixer, designing the electronics to be ahead of its technologically timeline.

With outside help from several UK fabrication companies including,
 
Tate Circuits,
JJ Electronics,
Keytech,

Our goal at Hink Pro has always been to develop and manufacture as much as physically possible here in the UK.


What We Need & What You Get

What We Need -

  • Money for tooling and manufacture here in the UK.
  • Support for a UK start-up

What You Get -

  • Unique and Exclusive perks and rewards for your much needed support and help.

What Spacefish Can Do -

Spacefish® is the product can add to flash photography. Don't get us wrong, we would love to take over the world! But we all know that's not going to happen. The point for us is to fill a gap in the market. We have had support from so many different industries it has really surprised us! These industries include, dentistry, forensics, automotive, fashion, medical research, aerospace and of course photographers all over the world.

We hope you share the same passion for this that we do!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Share the Project and the product on social media with your friends and colleagues
    • if you know people who would be interested in the Spacefish let them know!
    • Indiegogo has provided links for sharing the project for you guys to use so please use them!

 

Subscribe to our mailing list

* indicates required

I am a...

Email Format
story_txt:
What Is Spacefish®?

Spacefish is Chris' passion. The new design of this flashgun is his creation and it is work he is immensely dedicated to. The addition of the flexible neck not only gives the user more scope for creativity but also makes it fun to use. The project has been about making photography fun since day one. Chris' drive and determination have been steering this project thus far, and now it has come to the point where we need your help. Spacefish needs to be tooled and produced for you guys to get it in your hands, and on your cameras. We ask that you give a little, give a lot, or give what you can to help spacefish get off the ground.Our dream is to see spacefish on the shelves and in the hands of photographers and enthusiasts like you. To create a more fun environment for todays photographer and to make it easy and effective to light your images. So, why crowd-funding? Why Indiegogo?The Indiegogo community has been so supportive in the progress of many inspiring projects, making them a success and a reality. Unlike 'big company' campaigns we don't have an established company behind with masses funds to invest, we are a young start-up, UK company with limited funds. However Spacefish® has been designed from the very beginning to be inexpensive to produce and assemble, and mass production will lower the price further.For this reason we hope to demonstrate that the market is ready for this kind of device. A crowd-funding campaign is for us, a good starting point, because it will act as a reality check for us, it will demonstrate the need for this in the photography world, and will spread the word about Spacefish, allowing us to gather resources and build a photographic community around it. We also believe that the future of photography is wide open to projects like this and we have so many ideas to give to it. As a UK project Spacefish® needs the help of the very people that understand and appreciate the relevance of technologically-improved photographic equipment. Funds will be used to start-up the production process and R&D for further product innovation and engineering, allowing us to ship Spacefish in approximately 4 months. 



We are so excited to be moving ahead with this project and striving to bring the Spacefish to your cameras as soon as we can.As a business we have set ourselves some goals if this project is successful. We are looking to provide jobs to the local community and will hire, skilled and dedicated staff to further the Hink brand and release more products in the coming year. We are proud to be a UK business are pushing for the project to be made, not just in cheapest way possible, but the best. The Manufacture will be given only to the companies who can make the best of our design.We hope you keep up to date with us as we go on.

Required Power Source
Built in 3000mah 3.7v Li-Po Battery(possibly still growing!) 

Charging

story:
OUR AD IS IN THE New York Times. THANK YOU.

DOWNLOAD HI-RES PDF HERE: 

Dropbox links are currently down, see: http://i.imgur.com/a13jvEA.jpg

PDF: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z1oo1phsrwtbwik/direngeziparki.pdf
PSD: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ybmhrb0tq6vhtwc/direngeziparki.psd

All assets are open-source, please feel free to translate, print, distribute.

LEFTOVER FUNDS: FINAL REFERENDUM RESULTS: 83% Agree, 10% Undecided, and 7% Disagree. 

The campaign is officially over. We will make periodic announcements especially as the funds get utilized per the overall guidelines (but with modifications per the comments received especially from the minority "disagree" voters." Please keep in touch with us demokratikproje [at] gmail . com. AND THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU for making this the fastest crowdfunded political campaign!

  • Form a global coordination team of 10 experts, and provide a yearlong stipend/honorarium for their expenses in the amount of 200 TL each for a total of $12,000.
  • -> This goal was achieved through the forming of GB (www.gucbirligi.org) as a nonprofit in the US. Startup costs such as legal, corporate fees, etc. were covered.
  • Using advertorials on a variety of Internet platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Google, etc. reach at least 1 million undecided voters and inform them (50-100k direct reach at $0.2-$0.4 each) for a total of $21,000.
  • -> This goal was achieved through various online/offline campaigns and events. Please see gucbirligi.org for the events. We also gave a $10,000 non-recourse grant to vagus.tv. 
  • Reserve $12,000 for the technical cross platform needs of the internet platforms such as security, hosting, etc.
  • ->This goal was achieved through developing sonrakiadim.com, gucbirligi.com and GB's magazine (dergi). 
None of your donations went to any of the various expenses of any of the organizers they incurred during their volunteerism. They have all paid their own travel and other miscellaneous expenses on top of the countless volunteer hours they spent.

Text of the NYT AD created through deliberative democracy by you:

What is Happening in Turkey? 


People of Turkey have spoken: We will not be oppressed!

Millions are outraged by the violent reaction of their government to a peaceful protest aimed at saving Istanbul’s Gezi Park.

Outraged, yet not surprised.

Over the course of Prime Minister Erdoğan’s ten-year term, we have witnessed a steady erosion of our civil rights and freedoms. Arrests of numerous journalists, artists, and elected officials and restrictions on freedom of speech, minorities’ and women’s rights all demonstrate that the ruling party is not serious about democracy. 

Time and again, the Prime Minister has mocked and trivialized his nation’s concerns while Turkey’s own media have remained shamefully silent. 

The people protesting bravely throughout Turkey are ordinary citizens. We span several generations and represent a spectrum of ethnic, religious, socioeconomic, ideological, sexual, and gender identities. We stand united because of our concern for Turkey’s future. Our future.

We demand an end to police brutality. 
We demand a free media. 
We demand open democratic dialogue between citizens and those elected to public service, not the dictates of special interests.
We demand an investigation of the government’s recent abuse of power, which has led to the loss of innocent lives. 

Join the conversation and stand with us in solidarity. 

Crowdfunded Entirely by Concerned Individuals from Around the World

Many thanks to everyone for donating and all of the highly qualified professionals who have helped make this campaign possible by contributing their time and skills.

story:
Short Summary

My best friend is pretty great. They work as a Case Manager at an AIDS resource center in Jacksonville, FL where they started and maintain a trans* support group. They are honest, loving and passionate about justice, and they volunteer feeding homeless animals on their day off. Here's the thing, they need some help funding their top surgery. Currently they use a binder that hurts their back and makes summer days in Florida miserable. If I had the money to help them myself, I'd give it to them it in a second, but alas...I am asking for your help.

 

What We Need & What You Get

I am trying to raise $3,250 for Bradley's surgery, which will hopefully take place in early 2014. The full cost is approximately $6,500, but they've been saving for a while and have been able to save up almost half of the cost. If I don't reach the entire goal, the money will still go to fund Bradley's top surgery, the surgery just will be delayed until they can save the rest (but i'll update you on the progress!). If I get more than the goal I will donate the rest of the money to another top surgery fund.

Bradley is a very skilled artist and likes to make stencils. For a small donation they'll send you a patch of the stencil of your choice from ones they've already made (check out their etsy store, which is also used to fund the surgery, http://www.etsy.com/shop/transhome to choose which one you'd like), and for a larger donation they'll work with you to create a patch of your own likes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute any money, please help to share this fundraiser!

 

Thank you so much in advance, and if you have any questions at all please let me know.

-Chris

story:
AmbiVision is a smart affordable content-driven ambient lighting system.This technology enlarges the screen by projecting a glow of light from 4 sides of the back of the screen onto the surrounding wall.

It is the first standalone device connected by all video input standards like: VGA, HDMI, DVI,  S-Video, Composite, Component. Because of this, it doesn’t require any extra skills, no configuration files and compatibility problems.  AmbiVision supports all screen sizes up to 100 inches diagonally, and captures the screen from all games, video players, applications and so much more.

This device has a smart system of adjusting screen properties to the connected source. After pluging  the input signal, the device computes the best and the most efficient processing properties to grab pixels. Due to this, it provides support for all screens regardless of the resolution and video standard.

Ambivision adjusts itself to your room.

Thanks to a wall-adaptive function, the color of the light is perfectly aligned with the screen picture, regardless of the wall color.



AmbiVision creates a cinema-like atmosphere while watching the news, movies or games due to an impression that the picture surrounds you from each side and significantly increases the size of the screen. It's an especially great thing for 3D screens for enhancing a 3D experience. Add a new dimension to your viewing experience with AmbiVision.

This shows how AmbiVision can simply extend your screen.

People spend about 34 hours a week watching TV and much more while working on the computer. During dark to bright scene changes, the pupil of the eye reacts by decreasing its’ diameter twice over within 5 seconds for better eye protection.  When the scene changes from bright to dark, your pupil needs to increase its diameter from up to 180 seconds for clearer vision in the dark. In every movie, scenes switch from dark to bright hundreds of times. The result is that the muscles of your eyes are in constant tension which can lead to vision impairment.

Using AmbiVision , the muscles of your eyes are less strained therefore your eyes don't get tired while spending long periods of time in front of the screen.

When you turn off the screen, AmbiVision lights up for 10/30/60 seconds to escort you safely to bed. Obviously you can still control the lights by remote control or touch buttons.

By the touch keys or remote control you can enable a mood mode: static or fluently changing colors, which reduces your energy cost by replacing the lighting in the whole room to energy efficient LED lights behind a screen.


The secret for the perfect design relies on proper composition of a light source and high performance controller. Thanks to the digital WS2812B LEDs, we can create a high resolution effect without making "cable spaghetti".




Contemporary monitors and TV's are modernly designed. Therefore, AmbiVision has to be designed in a modern and minimalistic style as well. Thanks to a high performance DSP chip, the controller can process a video stream without any delays.


Now some solutions are available, but all require PC software, so the field of use is limited. Additionally software does not capture the screen while gaming or fullscreen  applications are on. Some solutions need extra plugins which require expert knowledge to make configuration files properly. We are different.

DSP chip analyzes video stream in real time. We use this feature to recognize black bars while watching movies and automatically adjust capturing areas.



Predominantly HDMI input would require a high cost HDCP license and increases cost of potential video signal converters. VGA input utilizes minimum external components in the best economical way. We tested various connection scenarios to achieve cooperation with almost all tuners(i.e: Dreambox), PCs, TVs, Embedded Solutions (i.e: Raspberry Pi, Android based devices), Projectors, Games Consoles (XBOX, PlayStation, OUYA) etc.

If your device has HDMI (or another type of standard) and VGA outputs, then you can connect AmbiVision directly without any other components.



A lot of TVs/AV receivers provide SCART/S-Video/Composite/Component output. By using converters to VGA you can connect to AmbiVision.



This is  a situation when your master device provides only one output. In this case you have to use splitter and (sometimes) the video converter.


The installation of AmbiVision is very simple and takes only 6-8 minutes depending on your screen size. The self-adhesive RGB LED strip is only 10 mm wide, and is flexible and bendable. You can stick it to the 4 sides of your screen and bend it at the edges easily. The adhesive material on the strip is good quality and reusable. You can remove it and transfer the strip to another monitor.



The last step is setting up the number of LEDs at every side by the touch buttons. Unused LEDs will be disabled automatically.





The first $10,000 will help us to obtain enough money to be able to get AmbiVision ready for production. Obviously larger  amounts allow us to produce more devices at rates much lower than future retail prices. That is why any contribution is quite important.


Now we have a fully working prototype built from final selected components, but some things need improvements. We plan to use the most appropriated mass production methods for packing manufacturing, manual creation and implement some firmware improvements.  We will start shipping in the latter part of March 2015.  Our production facilities are capable of making about 1000 kits within 1 month. Upon successful completion of the campaign, following the updates on this page or our social media.





More examples:

Everywhere. Free priority shipping for all backers regardless of the destination.  Depending on your location we include an appropriate power plug adapter (EU/US/UK/AU) and a warranty card with a 1 year period.


Q: Which input sources are supported?
 VGA is default inputs, but with suitabled converter you can use almost all inputs (HDMI, SCART, S-Video,DVI etc.)

Q: Do I need to configure the device before using?
Yes. You only need to enter the number of LEDs on each side of the screen. Then, if you need, you can adjust the brightness, colors gamma, positions of sensing areas, smart black bars detection and set the turn on time of  "go to sleep" light.

Q: Can my remote control work with AmbiVision?
If your remote control is based on infrared emitting, it will work. Only remote controllers based on radios are not supported.

Q: Could I update firmware of device when a new version is released?
Yes. It takes 2 minutes and requires basic knowledge of computers.

Q: Do I have to turn off the device after I turning off the screen?
No. It happens automatically. AmbiVision recognizes a lack of video signals and switches to low power mode. You can still turn on the mood mode by the touch keys or remote control.

Q: Does the device support HDCP?
Yes. The HDMI->VGA converter of the connectivity pack supports HDCP. If we meet an embedded HDMI input goal, AmbiVision will also support HDCP.

Q: Can I extend the LED strip myself?
Yes. AmbiVision controls max. 250 LEDs. It is too much for any screen, but people have unbelievable imagination...

Q: Does it support multiple screen modes?
One device can be connected to one screen. Thus, if you want to use AmbiVision for more screens, you have to use one device for each screen.

Q: Does AmbiVision work regardless of the operating system/some plugins?
Yes. It doesn't use any application, thus the operating system is irrelevant.


Robert Jaszczyk  - The founder of the project, who created the idea of screen backlighting in 2009. The first prototype was shown during the first year of studies in Wroclaw University of Technology. Now is a time of crowd-founding to show AmbiVision to all people around the world. He is responsible for hardware and software design. He always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.

Krystian Rusek – The software engineer who likes to invent new things. Experienced in the development of mobile, games and any other desktop applications. He also cover all internationals certification of devices to make sure that the product is safe and legally ready for distribution.

Izabela Tereszkiewicz – The designer  and manufacturing expert. A graduate of Wroclaw University of Economy. Controls all the manufacturing processes from the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics and feminine sense of colors which allows her to design a nice looking enclosure.

The Campaign has become possible thanks to a lot of other people:

Victoria Kozakiewicz

Robert Mielnik

Kinga Kaczmarek

Grzegorz Uhornicki

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Email support at ambivision@lab-team.com

last step is setting up the number of LEDs at every side by the touch buttons. Unused
LEDs will be disabled automatically.

 The first $10,000 will help us to obtain enough money to be
able to get AmbiVision ready for production. Obviously larger  amounts
allow us to produce more devices at rates much lower than future retail prices.
That is why any contribution is quite important. Now we have a fully working
prototype built from final selected components, but some things need
improvements. We plan to use the most appropriated mass production methods for
packing manufacturing, manual creation and implement some firmware
improvements.  We will start shipping
in the latter part of March 2015.  Our
production facilities are capable of making about 1000 kits within 1 month.
Upon successful completion of the campaign, following the updates on this page or
our social media.

More examples:
Everywhere.
Free priority shipping for all backers regardless of the destination.  Depending on your location we include an
appropriate power plug adapter (EU/US/UK/AU) and a warranty card with a 1 year
period.
Q: Which
input sources are supported?
 VGA is default inputs, but with suitabled converter you can use almost
all inputs (HDMI, SCART, S-Video,DVI etc.)
Q: Do I need to configure the device before using?
Yes. You only need to enter the number of LEDs on each side of the screen.
Then, if you need, you can adjust the brightness, colors gamma, positions of
sensing areas, smart black bars detection and set the turn on time of 
"go to sleep" light.
Q: Can my remote control
work with AmbiVision?
If your remote control is based on infrared emitting, it will work. Only remote controllers based on radios are not supported.
Q: Could I update
firmware of device when a new version is released?
Yes. It takes 2 minutes and requires basic knowledge of computers.
Q:
Do I have to turn off the device after I turning off the screen?
No. It happens automatically. AmbiVision recognizes a lack of video signals and
switches to low power mode. You can still turn on the mood mode by the touch
keys or remote control.Q: Does the device support HDCP?
Yes. The HDMI->VGA converter of the 
connectivity pack supports HDCP. If we meet an embedded HDMI input 
goal, AmbiVision will also support HDCP.Q: Can I extend the LED strip myself?
Yes. AmbiVision controls max. 250 LEDs. It is too much for any screen, but
people have unbelievable imagination...

Q: Does it support multiple screen modes?
One device can be connected to one screen. Thus, if you want to use AmbiVision
for more screens, you have to use one device for each screen.

Q: Does AmbiVision work regardless of the operating system/some plugins?
Yes. It doesn't use any application, thus the operating system is irrelevant. Robert Jaszczyk 
- The
founder of the project, who created the idea of screen backlighting in 2009.
The first prototype was shown during the first year of studies in Wroclaw
University of Technology. Now is a time of crowd-founding to show AmbiVision to all
people around the world. He is responsible for hardware and software design. He
always tries to keep everything profoundly simple.
Krystian Rusek – The software engineer who likes to invent
new things. Experienced in the development of mobile, games and any other
desktop applications. He also cover all internationals certification of devices
to make sure that the product is safe and legally ready for distribution.
Izabela Tereszkiewicz – The designer  and manufacturing expert. A graduate of
Wroclaw University of Economy. Controls all the manufacturing processes from
the start to the end of the product. She covers all financial topics and
feminine sense of colors which allows her to design a nice looking enclosure.
The Campaign
has become possible thanks to a lot of other people:
Victoria
KozakiewiczRobert Mielnik
Kinga KaczmarekGrzegorz UhornickiPlease let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!
Email support at ambivision@lab-team.com

story:
We Need to Collectively Unite!     

     Help us develop new tools to combat human ailments such as breast cancer and epilepsy; newer, better and healthier alternatives are out there, locked inside a very special plant.  The FDA has been saying for decades the Cannabis has no pharmaceutical benefit, but in the last 20 years, the literature has been indicating that it has enormous potential. 

     Everyone knows that burning plant material is noxious; it generates pyrolyitc byproducts that cause cancer.  Eating Cannabis is also inefficient, in a series of studies conducted, 87%  of subjects given 10-15 mg oral doses after 2 hours had no detectable THC in their blood stream.  After 6 hours, 57% had no detectable THC (1)

     Here at Nova Green we believe that vaporizing an oil of known content is the most direct, consistent and accurate way of delivering cannabinoids to your central nervous system.  Our friends and Us have enjoyed vaping raw honey oil for a while now, but we created something new.  An all natural 30% honey oil infusion of PG/VG with delicious flavors!  We are always trying something new,and hope to come up with a %100 VG formula.  

     Eventually, we plan to isolate the flavor and smell components (terpenes) of the flower so you can for example "vape sour diesel" oil.  Wouldn't it be great if we could have a "charllote's web vapor oil"?  For this we need to build a lab, we need equipment and materials for processing.  We need your help.  Anyone of you who has come in contact with us knows how we feel about cannabis; it's the people's medicine and sharing is caring!  

     So please, if you cannot donate, at least join us and send us an email with copy of ID and Dr. Recommendation for medical marijuana and join our collective!  

     All of the research that we conduct will be posted in a blog on our website.  OPEN SOURCE CANNABIS INFORMATION!


1. Mattes, R.D.; Shaw, L.M.; Edling-Owens, J; Engelman, K; Eloshy, M.A., "Bypassing the first pass effect for therapeutic use of cannabinoids."  Pharmacology Biochemistry and Behavior.   1993, 44, 745-747.

story:
Short Summary

Strength x Balance is many things. It’s a fitness method. It’s a lifestyle. It’s a community. It’s a state of mind. Created by experienced trainer, founder, and CEO Suzy Shulman, who draws on her diverse fitness backgrounds in yoga, pilates, and traditional strength-training, SxB is about movement that engages both your muscles and your mind. It’s about loving your body for what it’s capable of, for how it looks, and how it feels. It’s about finding movement that works for you. It’s about always remembering that what goes up must come down. It’s fitness for everybody, and every body.

After years of refining and defining the method,  we’re ready to bring SxB to the world. SxB VT will be the first SxB studio in the country, featuring a variety of fitness classes, personal training, lifestyle and nutritional coaching, and more from a strong, passionate team dedicated to helping women (and men) find themselves and find movement that suits their lifestyles.

We’re building a space to get sweaty and have fun, and we hope you’ll join us in helping to make this dream a reality. 


What We Need & What You Get

We’ve found an incredible space that needs a little work, and so we’re asking for $3,500 dollars to help turn it into a living, breathing studio. The money will go towards studio necessities such as:

  • Exercise equipment

  • Wifi installation

  • A sound system

  • Booking software

Our goal is to get the studio up and running as soon as we can, and so any amount you can give goes a long way for us. We’re building this studio for our community, and by donating, you can help create the studio you deserve: a friendly, welcoming space for women and men of all shapes and sizes, who share a common love of movement.


The Impact

SxB was born out of Suzy’s long professional fitness career. With many certifications in multiple fitness disciplines and years of experience as a trainer at well-respected studios around Vermont, she has the knowledge and business savvy to make SxB VT a success. SxB VT is what she’s been working towards for her entire career, and she knows that with the support of the community and the expertise of her amazing team, she can make this studio a reality.

By donating to this campaign, you’ll be helping to promote strength, body confidence, and healthy, happy lifestyles. There must be a moment in time and history for women to stand up and say, “I do not want to look like what you want me to look like!” - and with SxB VT, that moment is now.


Other Ways You Can Help

Any amount helps, and we appreciate from the bottom of our hearts any donations you’re able to make. If you can’t contribute financially, we hope you’ll help us get the word out on social media, sharing the link to this campaign and telling your SxB stories using the hashtag #SxB. And most importantly, we hope you’ll join us for a sweat session when the studio is up and running!

story:
1. How to open the housing?

Hold the device body and bottom up the device, slide down the bottom golden area with thumb to open the housing.

 

2. How to turn off Susee push notification on my phone?

1) Open Susee APP.

2) Tap on your profile photo.

3) Tap on Customization.

4) Shut down Susee skincare reminder.

 

3. Why my device blinking green light on top?

Have you long pressed the bottom key, or selected skin test on your phone APP? If you have selected skin test, the green light would run off in 7 seconds; if not, please open the housing, and use a straightened paper clip or something similar to hold down the reset button to restart the device.

 

4. I have finished skin test, but there is no data.

1) Please test again;

2) Please open the housing and click the reset button.

 

5. When do I need to reset my device with the reset button?

When your device has a program error or crashes, you usually use reset button to recover start-up procedure.

1) The battery is full and the essence is enough, but it cannot spray.

2) The battery is full, probes connect skin properly, but it cannot test.

3) Every button cannot work. The SPA device malfunctions.

 

6. What is the principle of our APP test?

The principle our skin test is on the basis that the resistance between two conductors (in a fixed distance) is different. There is flow of water between the keratinocytes (epidermis). The resistance between two points of skin various to the moisture content of different skin.  Then we can calculate the skin moisture content according to a series of formulas. Similar condition with one person swimming in a pool with both water and oil. The speed various from the different proportion of oil to water. We can calculate the oil content according to the “speed”.  

 

7. How long does it take for a fully charge and how long could it last?

Normally, it takes about 2 hours, and it can last for about five days with 10 days of standby time.

 

8. How to have skin test with the SPA device?

Long press the bottom Bluetooth key until the top light blink yellow and green alternately. Then stick two test points to skin and ensure the contact between test points and skin after the indicator blink for 5 seconds. It will blink green when your skin value is over 60%,  blink red while it is less than 60%. No color will display under inappropriate operation.

   

9. How to turn off the device?

Shut down your phone Bluetooth, disconnecting with the SPA device. Press the bottom key of SPA device until the status light under the bottom runs out.

 

10. Are the spray time of SPA machine pre-set as 30s? Could I set my own spray time?  

The device is temporarily unable to set spray time. The default time is 30 seconds. We recommend that 30 seconds is most appropriate and every spray should not too long. Cause skin absorption is limited. The skin can not absorb too much in a time. We recommend small quantities in high frequency.

11.How to contact you if I have some question about Susee SPA?

Tel: 86- 0755-86537722
E-mail: service@susee.biz

LOCATION: The 22nd Floor, Block A, Pacfic Business Building, Jiabin Road, Luohu Distriction, Shenzhen

story:
"A little over a year ago, we were introduced to a small bio-tech firm (Dad and Son) with an amazing new skincare technology. I got goosebumps after hearing their presentation, knowing that this new technology was going to revolutionize the skincare industry, and because I knew we HAD to develop a product utilizing it." - Elizabeth Vervynck, Co-owner of Apriori Beauty

 

Who are we?

Apriori Beauty is a small beauty brand located in southern California. We are privately owned by two women (myself and my partner, Susan Twellman) along with a handful of friends & family investors. We started Apriori Beauty to provide skincare products that were safe and effective and also to provide a vehicle for success for anyone who wanted to share the products with people they knew. Apriori Beauty takes pride in developing and sharing products that provide practical skincare solutions for anyone with skin through the use of pure ingredients and innovation. 

I have personally been in the skincare/beauty business developing and marketing products for over 22 years and strongly believe that this new HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology will revolutionize the industry. It is unlike anything I have ever seen before. We are so excited to be the first company to introduce a product with this technology in it. With your help, we will be able to get the word out to pre-launch and manufacture the first production of this innovative and exciting product. 

This is one of those innovations that in 20 years you’ll be able to say you heard about it and used it first! With Celloxylin® Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask, now you can hydrate from the skin's surface in!

 

Our Goal

Our goal is to spread the word about this exciting and revolutionary technology, and to bring this amazing product to life by February 2018! Pre-sale purchases will put this product into contributor's hands first, at a price that is heavily discounted. These contributions will not only help Apriori Beauty manufacture the first-run production of this product, but it will also help us build brand awareness at the same time. We strongly believe that all skincare, health, and wellness consumers have the right to safe and effective products, and Apriori Beauty is here to make that happen! Launching a product following this philosophy and paired with this incredible technology, we know it will also help to put Apriori Beauty on the map, and YOU can help to make it happen! 

 

Why Activated Water™?

It's a little known fact that 60-80% of skin and personal care product formulas are made up of distilled water. It's always the first ingredient listed on the ingredient deck because it makes up the majority of the formula. Yet, the water in these products is a "silent" ingredient, adding little to no user benefit other than to mix the remaining ingredients together and to provide desired viscosity. Naturally, skin and water do not mix well due to the oils secreted by the skin. The polar properties of oil and water create an interaction that prevents water from being absorbed or utilized for hydration by the skin. Thus, the majority of skincare products currently on the market contain a small percentage of ingredients that are actually active in providing the user with targeted hydration benefits. So, what are you paying for?

HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology treats the distilled water typically used in product manufacturing to change its compound structure to one that mimics that of oils. With this treatment, water is able to be mixed with the oils naturally produced by the skin in a manner that pushes water and its hydrating properties into the surface of the skin. For the first time ever, products manufactured with this water technology now have formulations with 70% active ingredients, 10 times more than those without this technology! With this contribution and pre-sale purchase, you can feel confident that you are buying a product that is working wholly for your skin's hydration and benefit. 

It's Clinically Proven!

As is done with any product or technological development, clinical studies were done over a period of several years with the HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology. Study after study exemplified astounding results! 

In one study, participants were split into two groups.  Distilled water was applied to one group and HydrO18™ Activated Water™ to the other. Each type of water was applied topically to participants' skin and levels of hydration were monitored and recorded over time. As shown above, participants treated with HydrO18™ Activated Water™ saw significantly higher percentages of skin hydration than those treated with distilled water, and these results were sustained over a period of 8 hours. 

 

Key Ingredients

Aside from the HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology, Apriori Beauty's Celloxylin Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask hosts a number of impressive ingredients. Key ingredients for hydration and anti-aging performance include:

  • Hyaluronic Acid
  • Kaolin clay
  • Shea Butter
  • Coconut Oil
  • Resveratrol
  • Apple Fruit Extract
  • Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract
  • Goji Berry 

 

 

Usage

Use as needed for hydration. Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin. Apply to face, neck and decollete. Leave on for 10-15 minutes allowing product to absorb into the skin. Rinse off remaining product with water or wet towel, or massage remaining product into skin. Can also be left on overnight — wake up to extremely hydrated skin.

Celloxylin® Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask, 1.7 oz | 50 g

 

Testimonials

On October 28th 2017, a select number of people received a sample of Celloxylin Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask. After using it, here's what they had to say about it... 

"My skin is noticeably softer and more hydrated than ever.   I am very impressed with the Moisture Extreme Hydrating Mask. It’s super moisturizing and my skin looks radiant.  The quality of this product is unbelievable! My skin feels flawless, after leaving the product on overnight.  The activated water is amazing!! I can’t wait to share this life changing product!" -Natalie Walsh, California

"I was amazed at how my skin felt after using the hydrating mask! I applied to my face and lips, waited 15 minutes, then I rubbed it into my skin and slept with it on. Do you know how your skin feels when you stay in a hotel room? It feels dry, like all the moisture was sucked out of your skin overnight! That's the dry air blowing in the room. Well, when I woke up, I realized my face didn't feel like that at all! It was so soft and hydrated! I used it again after coming home from a long flight. Same results. I cannot wait to get my hands on this in February!" -Paula Yudelevit, Maryland

"I can't wait for the hydrating mask to launch. Loved it on my face! Yesterday, I applied it to where I receive chemotherapy. It took the pain away along with some of the redness and the site is not peeling. I am so impressed!" - Pam Poliakoff, California 

"I’ve used the new Apriori mask with ‘active water’, three times in the last week and it has made my face plumper.  As I age my skin has less elasticity and therefore looks thinner, gaunt and drawn down.  After this mask my skin is so soft and my face actually feels and looks more full.  Which by definition means younger!  Yeah!  Thank you for formulating this fine product!" - Laurie Ford-Ferreira, California 

"I love how the Celloxylin Moisture Extreme Hydrating Mask felt going on! It has a cooling sensation to it and I could feel it going into my skin. Very refreshing!! I almost feel like my skin was plumper. I used it in the morning the first time and washed it off to use my other steps. Second time I used it in the evening and left it on overnight. I have oily/combination skin; I could not believe how amazing my skin felt. I normally get really shiny midday and have to blot or reapply powder. I go all day and night without having to since I have been using the mask. Love it!!" -Lisa Adam, Nebraska

 

Refer your friends, earn FREE products! 

Now you can earn a FREE Celloxylin® Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask and More when you refer others to pre-order on Indiegogo too. Here's how:

Create or Login to your account at Indiegogo.com
Use the Share Tools to gain referral sales by January 5th, 2018:

• Accumulate $500 in referral sales = Free Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask (ships in February) — $65 value
 
• Accumulate $1,000 in referral sales = Free Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask & a Celloxylin In the Bag skincare set — $210 value
 
• Accumulate $1,500 in referral sales = Free Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask + Free Celloxylin set In the Bag skincare set + Free PSR Next [Precision Skin Rejuvenator] —$315 value
 
No purchase necessary! Simply create a free account at Indiegogo.com to use their Share Tools to gain referral sales!

 

Connect with Apriori Beauty!

www.aprioribeauty.com

 Like and follow us on Facebook

 Follow us on Instagram

Follow us on Twitter

 Follow us on Pinterest 

 Subscribe to our Beauty Blog

The polar properties of oil and water create an interaction that prevents water from being absorbed or utilized for hydration by the skin. Thus, the majority of skincare products currently on the market contain a small percentage of ingredients that are actually active in providing the user with targeted hydration benefits. So, what are you paying for?HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology treats the distilled water typically used in product manufacturing to change its compound structure to one that mimics that of oils. With this treatment, water is able to be mixed with the oils naturally produced by the skin in a manner that pushes water and its hydrating properties into the surface of the skin. For the first time ever, products manufactured with this water technology now have formulations with 70% active ingredients, 10 times more than those without this technology! With this contribution and pre-sale purchase, you can feel confident that you are buying a product that is working wholly for your skin's hydration and benefit. It's Clinically Proven!As is done with any product or technological development, clinical studies were done over a period of several years with the HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology. Study after study exemplified astounding results! In one study, participants were split into two groups.  Distilled water was applied to one group and HydrO18™ Activated Water™ to the other. Each type of water was applied topically to participants' skin and levels of hydration were monitored and recorded over time. As shown above, participants treated with HydrO18™ Activated Water™ saw significantly higher percentages of skin hydration than those treated with distilled water, and these results were sustained over a period of 8 hours.  Key IngredientsAside from the HydrO18™ Activated Water™ technology, Apriori Beauty's Celloxylin Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask hosts a number of impressive ingredients. Key ingredients for hydration and anti-aging performance include:
Hyaluronic Acid
Kaolin clay
Shea Butter
Coconut Oil
Resveratrol
Apple Fruit Extract
Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract
Goji Berry 
  UsageUse as needed for hydration. Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin. Apply to face, neck and decollete. Leave on for 10-15 minutes allowing product to absorb into the skin. Rinse off remaining product with water or wet towel, or massage remaining product into skin. Can also be left on overnight — wake up to extremely hydrated skin.Celloxylin® Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask, 1.7 oz | 50 g TestimonialsOn October 28th 2017, a select number of people received a sample of Celloxylin Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask. After using it, here's what they had to say about it... "My skin is noticeably softer and more hydrated than ever.   I am very impressed with the Moisture Extreme Hydrating Mask. It’s super moisturizing and my skin looks radiant.  The quality of this product is unbelievable! My skin feels flawless, after leaving the product on overnight.  The activated water is amazing!! I can’t wait to share this life changing product!" -Natalie Walsh, California"I was amazed at how my skin felt after using the hydrating mask! I applied to my face and lips, waited 15 minutes, then I rubbed it into my skin and slept with it on. Do you know how your skin feels when you stay in a hotel room? It feels dry, like all the moisture was sucked out of your skin overnight! That's the dry air blowing in the room. Well, when I woke up, I realized my face didn't feel like that at all! It was so soft and hydrated! I used it again after coming home from a long flight. Same results. I cannot wait to get my hands on this in February!" -Paula Yudelevit, Maryland"I can't wait for the hydrating mask to launch. Loved it on my face! Yesterday, I applied it to where I receive chemotherapy. It took the pain away along with some of the redness and the site is not peeling. I am so impressed!" - Pam Poliakoff, California "I’ve used the new Apriori mask with ‘active water’, three times in the last week and it has made my face plumper.  As I age my skin has less elasticity and therefore looks thinner, gaunt and drawn down.  After this mask my skin is so soft and my face actually feels and looks more full.  Which by definition means younger!  Yeah!  Thank you for formulating this fine product!" - Laurie Ford-Ferreira, California "I love how the Celloxylin Moisture Extreme Hydrating Mask felt going on! It has a cooling sensation to it and I could feel it going into my skin. Very refreshing!! I almost feel like my skin was plumper. I used it in the morning the first time and washed it off to use my other steps. Second time I used it in the evening and left it on overnight. I have oily/combination skin; I could not believe how amazing my skin felt. I normally get really shiny midday and have to blot or reapply powder. I go all day and night without having to since I have been using the mask. Love it!!" -Lisa Adam, Nebraska Refer your friends, earn FREE products! Now you can earn a FREE Celloxylin® Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask and More when you refer others to pre-order on Indiegogo too. Here's how:Create or Login to your account at Indiegogo.comUse the Share Tools to gain referral sales by January 5th, 2018:• Accumulate $500 in referral sales = Free Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask (ships in February) — $65 value • Accumulate $1,000 in referral sales = Free Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask & a Celloxylin In the Bag skincare set — $210 value • Accumulate $1,500 in referral sales = Free Moisture Extreme, Hydrating Mask + Free Celloxylin set In the Bag skincare set + Free PSR Next [Precision Skin Rejuvenator] —$315 value No purchase necessary! Simply create a free account at Indiegogo.com to use their Share Tools to gain referral sales! Connect with Apriori Beauty!www.aprioribeauty.com Like and follow us on Facebook Follow us on InstagramFollow us on Twitter Follow us on Pinterest  Subscribe to our Beauty Blog

story:
Marlene's Mission to a New Kidney

Marlene has battled with kidney failure for over 6 years and, while dialysis is keeping her alive today, it is a stuggle for her every day!  I know what she is going through because my mom was on dialysis when I was a kid.  I saw first-hand what it does to someone.  My mother was lucky - her brother donated his kidney to her, and she lived another 35 years with one donated kidney.  I would have lost my mother at a very young age if it weren't for the wonderful generosity of my uncle.  Back in those days healthcare was different, you didnt have to pay out-of-pocket monies for a transplant, insurance really helped those in need, but things are different now.

Marlene has touched many peoples lives, as a friend, sister, aunt, cousin, daughter, and wife.  She always thinks of others before herself. 

 

Your contribution will go directly to pay for the 'initial' fees needed for Marlene's transplant. 

 

It's time to Pay It Foward~
